column3: “Jack Herer is my morning medicine.  I take it daily every morning before work, and it turns me into a happy, focused, energized person completely capable of working and talking to people without tripping over my tongue.  I was severely depressed for several months, then I started taking Jack every morning and my world view changed completely.  And btw, reading the other reviews makes me shake my head in disapproval. ...”

“I am known by any one who will listen to be a great lover of kushes to deal with a chronic nausea issue and social anxiety.  Since changing LP's have had lots of different choices to explore to control health issues.  I thought I had already had the best of everything until I tried Jack Herer.  It is my all time day time fave.  It is energizing, but at the same time calming.  Since I usually have high anxiety it's im...”

“This is one of my very favorite strains.  I am unusually vulnerable to feeling anxiety and paranoia when using cannabis, Jack has never even made me tense.  A reliable calm and uplifting experience that doesn't cloud my mind.  Functional daytime medicine.  I avoid this when I do school work, but that's about it.  
Only downsides in my experience are: morning headache (if smoked to close to bedtime) and unending, irre...”

“I came across a Jack Herer concentrate, has high terps and is incredible. This stuff makes you feel so good it's not even funny....well yea it is funny lol, anyways the taste on this stuff has got to be some of the best tasting concentrate I've ever had, tastes like very true Jack Herer. Best used for Anxiety, Depression, Spasms, & Pain in my opinion. They were raving about it at the dispensery saying this Holy Wate...”"

“Strain: Jack Herer
Seller: House of Gas - Anaheim, Ca
Consumed: Vaporized (S&B Crafty), multiple sessions, multiple times of the day.
Temperature: 188C 

Firstly and most strikingly, Jack Herer's smell already makes the strain its very own. As another review suggested, it may as well smell identical to lemon Pledge. Most certainly, but not quite. Yes. Nearly. 

Jack's strain is nature's recall. It's scent has a body,...”

“Jack Herrer is my favorite strain hands down.
Requires strict dose control to get the effect I want.
One small pipe hit....then maybe a second in 20 minutes or so.
Too much and I get jumpy and find it hard to stay on a single track.  That can be fun too...but its not what the tool does best.
Solutions to problems I am not trying to solve can be cool to think of...but I like to keep moving down a path.  Jack is a ...”

“Dense and sticky buds that were trimmed beautifully. Smells glorious!! Vaporized in a volcano and it was AMAZING!!! Instantly relieved my neck and back pain. I have MS, RA and a rare brain disorder that requires a shunt to drain spinal fluid. I've been in a lot of pain lately so I was hoping OregonMedigreen could help me out. Jim suggested some Jack Herer and gave me a little bit to try. This morning I woke up in hor...”

“great strain! it took me a while to get around to trying this perennial favorite, but it was immediately clear why it's so popular. one of the magical things about some strains is the capacity to get you out of your chair and inspire you to do a creative project. my 'champs' for this are bubbleberry, cinderella 99, and cinex. among the creative champs I've found a continuum of jittery-ness, that speed-like trait that...”
“Not big into sativas but this one I make an exception. This ones a knock out. I wouldn't doubt this one goes down in the history books like diesels. This is how all sativas should be”

“Jack Herer is a classic strain here in Bmore. I know the strain is Jack Herer, we call it Jack Hair, everytime it comes around. There are two reasons for that. One, when you break it apart to see the interior and to put it in the grinder, you get a hint of chocolate. Two, the high hits you within two minutes because Jack Hair is a very strong sativa.”

“Probably the best strain I have ever tried. The high lasts very long. OCD sufferers are in for a treat. Depressed people are in for a treat. Anxiety sufferers are in for a treat. This is a psychedelic strain. If you are an artist, beware, because you WILL have inspiration.”
“This strain is a great psychoactive for depression or for when your mind is feeling off" or slow. JH is a great daytime strain and a highly effective social one at that. If you take this by yourself
column4: I recommend no outside stimulations like TV or Facebook. JH shines a warm
column5: loving light in the darkest areas of the mind
column6: and is great for smoking alone. When you use it socially

column3: “With the vast array of symptoms  Jack Herer helps me with, I've termed Jack as the swiss army knife of cannabis"! By far my favorite strain of all time! I  typically gravitate towards sativa's for fatigue
column4: motivation to exercise
column5: mood
column6: appetite suppressant & focus. Jack has been a life saver for all of that as well as stress & anxiety relief. And this is one of the few sativa strains I can have in the evenings as it...”"

column3: “simply amazing, this is a perfect example of just how good cannabis can be, totally functional whilst on it, the creativity is epic, I'd recommend this strain to anyone, even the new smoker could have a couple hits on this & be totally at ease... this one turns it up to 11...”

“Oh my god, this strain is phenomenal. Very strong cerebral elevation, none of the anxiety that some sativas have. It makes one feel very vibrant, but still relaxed mentally. And it's very introspective, philosophical, promotes critical thinking.

It's a tiny bit of a creeper. It's so very, very euphoric and...well, magical feeling. I wish I had more! I burned through the bag of this strain very quickly. Hope I can ge...”

“What a fantastic strain. Though it's definitely sativa dominant, there's a strong indica vibe as well. I'd categorize it more as a sativa dominant hybrid, myself.

I've smoked this several times through a spoon pipe. The smoke is really light, and not harsh at all. The flavor is earthy and piney, but, again, it's not a strong flavor, at least through a pipe.

The high is very uplifting and happy, but without being ra...”

“Very uplifting and long-lasting high; no paranoia or head-lock with this intense but euphoric buzz. I recommend to all up-tight, self-righteous, aimless souls running on auto-pilot (worked for me!).”

“During early stages of radiation I was recommended Jack Herrer as a med. Thank you! It gave me the much needed sleep and pain relief as well as curb the anxiety associated with cancer treatment itself. It got me off the highly addictive opiates that were also prescribed for pain and helped with nausea. Great med!”

“If you are looking for a pick me up throughout the day, you have come to the right strain. This herb provides a focused and energetic buzz, but is mellow on the anxiety unlike many sativa strains. Jack Herer definitely stimulates my creative juices, and on top of all of that it helps relieve the inflammation and pressure feeling in my joints, especially my knees and ankles from being on my feet at work all day. And f...”

“🌲🍭 Forget the espresso, Jack Herer is better than any cup of coffee in the morning. This is a spectacular Sativa-dominant hybrid that has been around for a little while. With sharp notes of pine and an earthy sweetness to it, this is a delicious and smooth smoke. It is amazing for relieving your anxiety and putting you in a better mood. This is such a good morning strain that I know more people that use this regula...”
“Just had open heart surgery 3 weeks ago this is the best shit for pain management! Beats all the addictive pain meds they had me on.”

“I honestly LOVED this strain when I was a heavier smoker, but after taking a break and trying a few hits of this just rushes back memories of high school and hanging with great friends. Consider this one ol' reliable because I've never received a non-potent strain. Great cerebral high, very euphoric and tingly, then has a bit of a body buzz mostly in the chest back and gut. Definitely not one you wanna chief being a ...”

“The aroma and flavour suck you into nostalgia like fresh baked bread.  

Then the energetic body buzz hits you and it's all ✌and ❤️ just like it was back in the '60s.

Soon after you may realize you were born in the '70s or '80s.  

Good thing you are so high you DGAF!”

“This was one of the most uplifting strains I've ever had the pleasure of trying.

Had me laughing at a sitcom that didn't deserve to be laughed at.

If you need a pick-me-up, try this immediately.”
“Jack Herrer is a great weed. It is very strong in comparison to the low price.”
“Jack H is my go to friend. Always uplifting and long lasting”

“jack herer is amazing for the uplifting and energy. Such a great sativa for getting stuff done thoughout the day and helped me personally a lot with coming out of a depression. I totally recommend. The taste, smell, and looks of the jack herer i sampled were very outdoorsy and earthy. And again the high is uplifting and happy and energizing.”

“Purchased from BM. Upon opening the bag these buds had a very smooth scent. Not traditional skunk; earthy and slightly musky. Dark green buds covered in brown hairs. 

When packed in my Solo vaporizer the taste is very similar to the smell, almost wet like forest. The onset is a couple minutes after the first draw. The stone is extremely clear, definitely recommended for daytime, perfect for work. I found myself sh...”

“look, I don't know why you are taking marijuana. Whether it's for recreation, PTSD, insomnia, sickness, whatever. All I want to say is I have discovered a really fun thing to do. If you're having a kind of down day put on the song Everybody Everybody by Black Box. Turn it up as loud as you can stand it and I dare you to try and keep your body still. You won't be able to keep from dancing. It will take over you in a g...”

“A wonderful hybrid strain excellent for medicating throughout the day and evening. Jack Herer provides a strong cerebral uplifting sensation along with a focused creativity at first, however after some time the effects tend to become more indica-like leaving you feeling relaxed and somewhat sleepy. Sour and slightly spicy smelling with floral and woody hints as well. Much more floral on the taste and slightly sweet, ...”

“Coughed a bit much.
But I'm now trying to understand the universe.
You win some, you lose some.
Everything is awesome
Peace out
#jackherer”

Jack definitely has a way of lifting the fog + spirits, brightening your mood + outlook ☀️• 5⭐️ • This strain would bring together Kim Jong Un & tRump, Fidel Castro & Geo Bush Sr, The Ayatollah Khomeini & J...”

“BELIEVE THE HYPE. This strain has earned its claim to fame. Such a wonderful, euphoric, uplifting high. Can make the most dreary day feel like the nicest day in summer. Makes you hyper-intune with your surroundings. You sleep more. You hear more. You feel more. You smell more. It's like taking the training wheels off your brain. Some of the most far out thoughts and the most personal insights I've made have been on t...”
“Jack Herer gives you that happy
column4: positively beaming" mindset and energy that you usually see in people who eat very healthily and exercise regularly.  Like you can conquer the world.  Like that beat up 2001 Honda Civic you're driving is a 2024 Ferrari.  This has become one of my regular strains for the creative workday!”"

column3: “I love the lime life saver taste/smell of Jack here. And the uplifting energetic high.”

“As someone who is just getting into smoking for anxiety/depression, Jack Herer is awesome for me.
I only smoke a tiny amount (2-4 hits worth) and call it good for the day/night depending on my work schedule for the week. 

                                  ** My Overall Experience **

After about 5-10 minutes it kicks in. You can feel the calm and relaxing affect. While high everything that is funny becomes even funn...”

“Gold star sativa. In my top 5 favorite strains. Excellent head high...energetic and keeps me up and alert. Don't smoke this if you're trying to pass out for the night or get in a quick nap. Excellent for staying up late and being active, social situations, driving and sex. Incredible viagra-esque effects that will eventually leave you and your partner thumping away all night (or day) Note to self: Definitely buy when...”

“Good morning Jack! There are few people I enjoy having over for breakfast, but Jack is welcome ANY DAY! Fat...tight....and dripping with resin. I haven't had as much time with Jack as I would like (he was expensive company)  but the time we did have was magical....so magical we decided to landscape and redo my ENTIRE backyard😒 (in fall)....I still have mixed feelings about it...but somehow Jack sees me through. Be S...”

column5: although too much and it might be...well
column6: too much.  It's very potent.

column2: as it can keep you up
column3: but it's a great

column3: “Very light and neutral taste and smell, as well as a light feeling high. This is the best I've ever smoked for ideas and euphoria, and feeling euphoric about ideas. Astounding creativity off this stuff, first time being high has made me feel smarter.”

“I found myself...uplifted, not awkward, a little weird, and even happy.! A great boost of energy and feel-good vibes took over. Go Jack Herer. I was having THE ~shittiest~ day yesterday and i met up with my friend last night who happened to have this strain and i was immediately revived and well again. I mean like..SHITty to dangerously amazing. Plus, i am up right now and it's 7:24 in the morning. Woke up with no al...”
“My first smoke EVER. Such a great feeling. And I hear it is one of the best, so I was really fortunate to get this great strain and have such a good feeling for my first time.”

“I love Jack, because I can't get really get tired of it. The high is just perfect and there's no munchies. Well, munchies are great, but sometimes they aren't and this is when Jack Herrer comes to help. 
I've been walking around, riding longboard, talking with people, always easy.”
“GAVE ME THE HAPPIEST THOUGHTS OF MY LIFE!!! THANK YOU JACK!!!!!!”

it's 💣💩

Highly recommended 👍

🗣💨”

“Such a happy easy going high, I forgot completely about my pain and my thoughts of depression
This strain is incredible can't wait to smoke another bowl!”

“This strain, Jack Herrera is one of my go to favorites first thing in the morning or anytime of the day when I have a little fatigue and need a pick me up. It's great for projects or for just hanging around and enjoying your favorite hobbies. It' has a full-bodied kushy Taste with A very Piney, earthy and spicy undertones with some of the most orange pistol hairs you'll ever see. Enjoy this strain because with all th...”

A very spicy and citrus smell to the smoke too, but the tase is a different story...The taste is where you get the Skunk influence and it gives off a dried oni...”

You can't help but smile and if anything was bothering you, you simply forget about it. The right amount of spaciness as well....Just enough to make it fun.”

“2 vape tokes and could focus on preparing dinner while visiting a guest. 2 more before going to a choir concert. Usually standing in line for a while would be excruciating enough to make a concert unenjoyable, but I happily chatted with my companion, unaware of pain. Then the concert- my hearing was enhanced and music was so much better! Some songs I felt every note.”

It left me tingly and giggly, but eventually smoothed out into a nice relaxing body high with some of the euphoric, happy emo...”

“Background info:
This is my first product ever from BM, so any bias opinion and report is possible. Ive always smoked no name indica dominant hybrid dank... Very very piney smell. Really fluffy as well. The crystals in the bud is shining in room ...”

Some of the best part out there I think for anybody with any type of form of anxiety no real come down from the there just a true professional high quality sativa help stimulate ...”

“Honestly, it's probably a 3 for me actually, but I'm hoping next time will be better. This time the high was just TOO intense. Energetic, ambitious...those are pretty good words. Really makes your head BUZZZZZ. 

I think maybe in  more appropriate situation, like a party with friends, this could take shit to the next level (in a good way). 

But if, like me, you were just hanging out doing housework, then you might f...”

Quite the legendary strain for obvious reasons,

With loosely dense buds that have an array of crystals
showcasing from the bottom of the stems to the tips of the leaves.
A smell that is of a tropical, lightly piney aroma mixed and fresh fruit, 
the taste & smell are one in the same with this bud.

sativa ef...”

“I tried this at my husbands suggestion. I have to say I'm an indica or hybrid kind of girl, but this has to be my favorite sativa!!! I smiled the entire time, and the lung expansion was crazy! Our batch tasted of roses, and wasn't at all unpleasant!! Very cerebral high, low eyes, but not as much couch lock as relaxation. Good day time meds for pain and depression!”

“This review will be for non casual smokers. Jack Herer is a powerful strain that's easy to find on the west coast. I would be lying if I said this is the most powerful strain you can find. However, finding more powerful strains requires effort and networking. On the west coast, Jack H. is readily available from most dispensaries (Amsterdam does not have real Jack H. They label things for tourists.) But it is powerful...”

“Migraine pain coming on; nausea 4 when I finally medicated round 1900 or a few min earlier. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. Energetic, got a good workout in. :-) No anxiety/paranoia (a must for me). Head high strong but not overwhelming. Body highy exactly what I needed but wearing off fast after 2 hours. Skunky, piney taste. Very nice but not my fav by far. I'd recommend for daytime use for pain...”

“Hello my friends! How are you? I'm good, thanks! 
This strain is weird, but uplifting. Still somehow I cant write properly. 
She makes me superhearing and focused. 
Thats all, my friends! Peace! P”

But once I got a proper 1/4oz, of a good, true phenotype to what the strain is supposed to be, I realized why this strain is still at every dispensary in the country after over 2 decades.  Jack makes me happy first and foremost, it makes me more socially inclined (talkative) and whatever ...”"

“A lifesaver.  Literally -- as it kicks the shit out of a raging depression.  The descriptor on the Jack Herrer page uses the word 'blissful' and that absolutely nails it.  And, because one feels blissful, one can, if one wants, suddenly get productive.  And because there's a solid cerebral component to it, I find the quality of what's getting produced tends to be high.  Not merely a good strain, a GREAT strain.”

“Excellent strain. Smells and tastes like your average bud but hits like a slow moving freight train on a waterfall.
Don't get caught smoking this without a drink though, it makes your mouth feel like the Sahara desert. It also feels like a peasant threw sand in your eyes but it's totally worth it.
The high came on slowly, but after about half an hour I realized I was ripped out of my skull. It was a really nice energ...”
“This is a very nice Sativa. It made me feel happy and creative.”
“This is a really good strain for being active. I can smoke this and go on a run without getting tired.”

“Very well rounded high, you forget all your stress and feel uplifted. Good mind high, you can think clearly, yet be creative and let yourself go.”
“My friend's weed, which he called Jackal." I guess this is the same thing

column3: “One of my favorites1”
“completly high”

“Not to fond of the name but when using it, I had one of the best highs I have ever experienced. It was an uplifting high that didn't make me feel drowsy or sluggish. It isn't a harsh strain when using which I love and it smells pretty great as well, I would definitely recommend this strain to anyone.”
“Wow this one is a great day high. I have been battling depression of my father passing and a break up. This strand helps you to be calm and resilient & not be tired. It keeps you a float. 🤗”

“This is a good evening strain for me. It leaves me a bit too “stoned” for daytime. For reference my fave daytime strains are XJ-13 and Tangerine Dream. This is slightly stonier than those. Great at relaxing muscles 

If like me, you are prone to auditory hallucinations with weed, this seems low risk. I haven’t had any with this this strain 🙂”
“This is the best sativa I've had in a while”
“Perfect for the mornings.”
“This bud has a high you can feel off the first few hits. Very calm but euphoric feeling. Helps to sleep and eat. A long, uplifted high.”
“converted me to a sativa guy”

“No REAL nugz. Hairy but but not all that crystallie either.  Vegy good stone.  Felt good smiled a lot.  Thenn made sleep very pleasant to slip off into.  I this would be perfect to vape.  Not a lot of work to break it down and dry it out,  and combined with the difference in the high gotten from vaping, i bet it would be a strong, long, clean high!”
“clear headed, crisp taste of fruity/piney with a mellow uplifting buzz!”
“The famous Brothers Cannabis Club Jack Herer is NO JOKE.”
“Very well rounded high, you forget all your stress and feel uplifted. Good mind high, you can think clearly, yet be creative and let yourself go.”

“I'm not typically a sativa fan favorite, but I really wanted to try this for the high cbd of 2.00%.  I have severe pain in my leg and hip.  This is definitely a sativa!  Duh.....  It did seem to help with the pain, and my husband and I shared this.  Got the giggles, but not for too long.  Ok, we were at a fancy restaurant so maybe that caused me to tone it down some.  All in all, a nice strain.  I hoped I would like ...”

“The amount of myrcene makes it a sativa.  It is like an indica but the taste is so different to the rest.  It is lemon and sea salt.  If you ever happen to have JH in a mexican restaurant, order a corona with lemon and you will have the cheapest margarita experience just by feeling the sea salt in your salivary glands”

“Jack Herer is my first pure sativa, and I found it to be excellent for getting things done. My experiences prior to trying this strain have been with hybrids that usually leave my head fuzzy. While I have energy to get things done, the fuzziness leads to concentration or memory problems. Jack Herer has absolutely none of that. I feel completely clear and focused on whatever I'm doing. Two small hits from a vaporizer ...”
“This weed is phenomenal I'm baked as hell off of if right now and im telling ya, this is the strain for chillin.”
“clear headed, crisp taste of fruity/piney with a mellow uplifting buzz!”

“Great strain!!! Morning specifically! I had some 100% sativa Jack Herer, and damn... It hits hard. Off the first small snapper bowl it went straight to my dome instantly, I smoked 3-4 more snappers and it kept getting intenser and intenser. Its a great strain for pain and if you just want to get straight dome rocked. No sleepiness!”

“This is the most stimulating bud I have ever smoked.  After medicating I had a strong compulsion to clean my house and do some cardiovascular exercise.  Can’t be a lazy bones on Jack, and that’s a great thing for those who struggle with depression.  Small caveat: for those who are prone to anxiety, you may want to take it easy on this stuff.  My head was pretty racy until it mellowed out.”
“The famous Brothers Cannabis Club Jack Herer is NO JOKE.”

“Falcanna is an excellent breeder and Jack Herrera is an example of their superior ability to produce the best in taste and quality. I myself am big on taste and that's why I love this strand. However, I have tried the Alien Girl Scout Cookies from Falcanna and it is by far my favorite.”
“Had some ice hash made from this, and gotta say the craziest/nicest smell. Hits you very hard with lemony-banana. Kinda like lemon head candy. Nice clean high, very cerebral.”
“Extremely uplifting makes me feel so much happier than other strains best when smoked out of a bong or vaporized.”

“One of my favorite Sativa strains. It gives you a very functional high and its not overwhelming. Definitely recommend for Anxiety as it gives a pretty good feeling. The only thing I don't care for is it smells like poop.”
“Had some ice hash made from this, and gotta say the craziest/nicest smell. Hits you very hard with lemony-banana. Kinda like lemon head candy. Nice clean high, very cerebral.”
“Sex reincarnated as a plant.”
“converted me to a sativa guy”

“Smelled like pine trees.  

pure cerebral sativa high.  Very strong

Did not have the mind numbing effect i need in a medical marijuana but if you want to get really stoned it would be great.”
“The famous Brothers Cannabis Club Jack Herer is NO JOKE.”
“It's was a very smooth smoke. Didn't burn my throat. It's perfect for wake n bake, because it's a gentle way to wake up and get ready for the day. Especially if you have anxiety like me.”

West coast strains rule!”

“This is a very nice Sativa. It made me feel happy and creative.”
“unreal strain, put me on my ass”
“Absolutely amazing. Incredible cerebral high & very uplifting. A true recommendation and great for headaches and stress.”

“Jack Herer is a nice mellow strain. It is really nice for day time use. I found it made me feel less pain and it had an uplifting quality that if you are having anxiety or depression it really helps. It has a nice earthy, woody taste.”
“Had some ice hash made from this, and gotta say the craziest/nicest smell. Hits you very hard with lemony-banana. Kinda like lemon head candy. Nice clean high, very cerebral.”

“From the flavor to the overall effects this is one of my new favorite concentrates. I find it works best for a uplifting happy day time strain. Going thorough some tough times and this strain helps take the edge off. I agree 100% with the effects and medical list. I have quite the tolerance and only a few hits needed for a very functional high. Beware, more than a few hits will send you to space”

“Not bad, but not a favourite. Seems great, reduces pain moderately, and calms me down for a few hours but then usually I realize I've got no determination, no will to keep working at projects. In my opinion, not a good daytime pain reliever if you have to get work done. If I smoke a bit more frequently, my attention span is better, but when I do that, I have problems with shakiness during days off.

Usually at some p...”
“This is a very nice Sativa. It made me feel happy and creative.”

“This is one of my favorites! 
Feelings- Happy and relaxed
Medical- Stress or times when you think the world is coming to an end.
I'm an openly gay man, and i relocated to Ohio where conditions don't favor homosexuality or weed. Jack Herer is my outlet. I smoke or bake ( cannabutter with the leaves) about 1 once a month on ave. I suffer from depression and muscle spasms in my legs.. Jack H. not only helps my depressio...”
“This is the best sativa I've had in a while”

“Cosmic shrub! can't say enough good things about this strain. The high is super upbeat and carries you up on the wings of a majestic eagle. Makes work bearable and extracurricular activities dope as blade. Mix'er up with a little a green crack and get your self an iced coffee from your local bean roaster and you're drivin' with a full tank a gas til lunch time -- call'er the hippie speedball HEH HEH HEH! Love tha stu...”

“Today I was in a little bit of a happy mood, followed by some pain, while I am trying to keep my hopes and mind happy today was very tiring. After taking jack I feel very motivated, to try new things I am relaxing and just chilling. For some of the effects work different on me, this is making me a little sleepy which is good for later it's going to correct my sleeping patterns when I ride this one out. I would say do...”
“This is a very nice Sativa. It made me feel happy and creative.”

“I was suspicious of the lore of Jack Herer (the strain, not the dude).  Not it is among my two favorite strains for Wake and Bake on the weekends (GSC is the other). It offers the perfect chill cerebral buzz while not locking me on the couch. It provide focus and humor.”
“As someone diagnosed with generalized anxiety, this strain is a live saver. Calms my nerves and can even stop mild attacks. I love me some JH”
“It's was a very smooth smoke. Didn't burn my throat. It's perfect for wake n bake, because it's a gentle way to wake up and get ready for the day. Especially if you have anxiety like me.”
“Can never go wrong with Jack,  if you're ever unsure about selecting a sativa; let Jack grace you!”

“Oh my days, I absolutely love this stuff! Spicy and euphoric, Jack Herer hit me like a brick to the back of the head and lasted throughout the afternoon. I gave my glass a good cleaning before lighting up and I'm very glad I did. My appreciation for music was greatly enhanced as well as my ability to get absorbed in a good book. I'd recommend Jack Herer before turning up the stereo.”

“I tried Jack Herer recently, smoked it for 2 weeks and definitely fell in love with the strain. I found this strain to effect the mind but also create a relaxing numb for the body that's not too overpowering and doesn't feel like a couch lock. Music sounded profoundly better while being medicated on this strain, and images were sharper. I suffer from an overproductive brain, and I'm constantly thinking but for the la...”
“This is a very nice Sativa. It made me feel happy and creative.”

“Pro:  Smooth to smoke, giggly after you toke.  You'll be upbeat without being paranoid.   Smells wonderful and sweet.   What a wonderful giggly and creative weed.   I wrote the last chapter of my book as I saw an event that would have passed me by --- laughed so hard I had tears in my eyes at how good this ending will be.  You'll see.  ;-)
Con: After 2-3 hours, I get really sleepy.
When: Have to hang around the famil...”

From what I remember, this was the most Psychedelic high that I experienced at the time; I remember looking at the street signs, all of a sudden written in Hebrew script(!?). Haha. I use sativas for nighttime use, and this had me comatose on a neon cloud. Lov...”

“Jack Herer got me Ripped!”

“This Jack is a sativa-dominant phenotype with airier, less dense buds but are still packed with crystals. They smell a lot like lavender soap but when vaporized have a woodier flavor that reminds me of sandalwood. The medical effects are uplifting with good relief from neurogenic pain and muscle spasms. I find this strain aids with creative endeavors and although strong, is still appropriate for daytime use.”

This sativa strain is a classic and i do recommend it to anyone who's looking for something to smoke in the morning or aftern...”

I can dig it.”

“If you have high anxiety, paranoia, or panic attacks than this is the Sativa for you! Most Sativa based strains will give me anxiety or panic but not Jack Herer!

I Find this Sativa to be an amazing head focused medication with mild body affects for easing pain while remaining uplifting in its nature. Great for helping with social anxiety, migraines, mild pain and stress.

Will definitely be keeping an eye out for more Jack!”
“One of my favorites1”
“Strong Buzz. Thought stimulating and heady high. Def one of the best strains out there.”

“Nice uplifting high. The high Doesn't last very long though.”

“I suffer from chronic  pain all over my body,  muscle spasms, migraine headaches, insomnia.
 I've been testing  A few strains of marijuana. 
First I triad Jack Herer and it works well for the pain so far.  It doesn't take all of my pain away, but it makes the pain  bearable.”

“ It's all Herer's fault!" This strain not alone will put you in the best mood ever but also brings over a total euphoric effect over the mind and body.  This sativa strain is great for a creative mind and being active
column4: not a sofa lounger smoke. It is a bit harsh of a smoke but well worth the high.”"

column3: “Jack Herer is one of the most potent medicines available today. With a strong, confusing, head high that comes on in a rush after a hit or two, with no real plateau for the nearly-psychedelic high. Not what I'd call a Wake'n'Baker, I almost always experienced paranoia smoking before work, definitely for use at home after work to wind down, as the stress relieving properties in a relaxed environment are amazing. Great...”

“I tried Jack Herer recently, smoked it for 2 weeks and definitely fell in love with the strain. I found this strain to effect the mind but also create a relaxing numb for the body that's not too overpowering and doesn't feel like a couch lock. Music sounded profoundly better while being medicated on this strain, and images were sharper. I suffer from an overproductive brain, and I'm constantly thinking but for the la...”

“Love me some Jack! Nice uplifting, euphoric high without the speedy/racy side effects that I don't like from some other sativa strains. Perfect strain for inspiring creativity, like painting or writing.”

“The smell, taste, and appearance all remind me a little bit of really good 'commercial weed' for some reason.  I felt the effects of this strain 3 hits into a bowl.  Very powerful! “Pro:  Smooth to smoke, giggly after you toke.  You'll be upbeat without being paranoid.   Smells wonderful and sweet.   What a wonderful giggly and creative weed.   I wrote the last chapter of my book as I saw an event that would have passed me by --- laughed so hard I had tears in my eyes at how good this ending will be.  You'll see.  ;-)
Con: After 2-3 hours, I get really sleepy.
When: Have to hang around the famil...”
“Sex reincarnated as a plant.”
“It's was a very smooth smoke. Didn't burn my throat. It's perfect for wake n bake, because it's a gentle way to wake up and get ready for the day. Especially if you have anxiety like me.”
“This is a very nice Sativa. It made me feel happy and creative.”

“I tried Jack Herer recently, smoked it for 2 weeks and definitely fell in love with the strain. I found this strain to effect the mind but also create a relaxing numb for the body that's not too overpowering and doesn't feel like a couch lock. Music sounded profoundly better while being medicated on this strain, and images were sharper. I suffer from an overproductive brain, and I'm constantly thinking but for the la...”
“Jack Herer got me Ripped!”

“My go-to creative strain. Hardly anytime when I smoke this and don't have a couple ah-ha" moments and great thought collection sessions. Makes you a bit sleepy after but it feels like all that mental work you deserve the rest! Eyes don't have a lot of pressure so it's easier to pass off as sober
column4: not to mention it packs a punchload of effects with just the smallest bowl
column5: lasting a surprisingly long time.”"

column3: “I was suspicious of the lore of Jack Herer (the strain, not the dude).  Not it is among my two favorite strains for Wake and Bake on the weekends (GSC is the other). It offers the perfect chill cerebral buzz while not locking me on the couch. It provide focus and humor.”

“I like the smell. It seems like a sour diesel at first, but the taste is actually a tobacco like with a woody smell on the tip of your noses.

I would recommend this strain for people who want to quit smoking cigarettes because the taste is way better that tobacco plus it will clear your head rather than put your head down like cigarettes.”
“It's was a very smooth smoke. Didn't burn my throat. It's perfect for wake n bake, because it's a gentle way to wake up and get ready for the day. Especially if you have anxiety like me.”

“Jack is an amazing strain. simple as that. makes me a happy camper. great for daytime. picks me up, spins me around, and sets me down gently. pretty much what I'm looking for in any strain.”

If you ever happen to have JH in a mexican restaurant, order a corona with lemon and you will have the cheapest margarita experience just by feeling the sea salt in your salivary glands”

“Amazing motivating strain. This got me feeling amazing and I felt so at ease. I just got done camping and I picked this strain up it had an over whelming aroma for a 1 gram. It was like a Spicey fruity taste and smelled like pepper. I got so motivated to the point I actually started playing my guitar again after that I finally sat down and learned a song. Amazing 9.5/10”

“Smell is subtle springy, minty with a touch of lemon. Or is it lemon with a touch of mint? Either way it’s inviting. Tastes like it smells, every note is subtle but distinct and the flavor is nicely balanced. A light hashy flavor on the aftertaste and very smooth smoke.
Takes two or three minutes to work. The high is very cerebral, great for attention problems, anxiety or if you need motivation to get things done.
Af...”

My background: anxiety, adhd, seasonal depression.”
“Very uplifting high. Worked very well for my pain and I could still do tasks around the house.”
“Nice strain with strong mind high. Doesn't make you very drowsy.”
“This is a very nice Sativa. It made me feel happy and creative.”

“I was excited to try this strain because it has great feedback for anxiety-prone users, but this strain made me extremely paranoid. I tried it on different occasions at different times of day and it didn't make a difference.

My background: anxiety, adhd, seasonal depression.”

“Tasted a bit spicy, it has a really interesting flavour and smell. It made me feel very energetic and in a great mood. Great for appreciating music, try not to get couch lock, because if you can pull yourself off the couch you’ll want to do something active.”

“I smoked quit a bit of this a few hours before performing stand-up comedy, then more immediately before. I definitely felt more comfortable and creative on stage than I would've sober. However, the few hours beforehand I felt like I was teleporting around. I would often look around and wonder how I got to a place, and once turned to my friend and asked where we were after 10 minutes of walking. I didn't feel too out ...”
“I felt free. Clear mind, body, and spirit type of vibe with this bud. Def good for anytime throughout the day.”

“I was suspicious of the lore of Jack Herer (the strain, not the dude).  Not it is among my two favorite strains for Wake and Bake on the weekends (GSC is the other). It offers the perfect chill cerebral buzz while not locking me on the couch. It provide focus and humor.”

My background: anxiety, adhd, seasonal depression.”
“I felt free. Clear mind, body, and spirit type of vibe with this bud. Def good for anytime throughout the day.”

“This has become my favorite strain to use during the day while out and about. Chills and slows me down enough where I can relax and function normally. Good ol anxiety making things complicated in life. Jack herer gives me a pleasant floaty head feeling and leaves me smiling contently. It’s not too much or overpowering. I am still productive and social.”
“SUPER DUPER SATIVA! Great before working out headband effect to the fullest very fun to smoke and have conversations with this strain👀👀”
“More body effects than you'd expect from a pure sativa.  Very uplifting headbuzz.”
“Time seemed to stretch a lot. 15 Minutes felt like way over 1 hour, perfect for stretching out a nice evening playing video games or watching movies.”

“Jack Herer is an awesome strain. I have arthritis a s I used Jack in the morning and I felt a huge pain relief helping me to begin my day. Also at my work I feel the 'creativity' running thru me making me more focus and with great brainstorm ideas. The smell is really nice and strong!”

“Thoroughly enjoyed a nice spliff with a friend around 45 minutes ago. Still feeling sharp and on the ball but with a calm approach towards the day. Lovely smooth smoke with no dryness scratching away at the throat. Recommend this strain immensely!”

“Jack Herer was such a delight for me and my pal, that we began to trip out to these previous comments and think WOW those guys were so high!! Am I right? Were you? Haha, but seriously Jack Herer is a must try! I'd reccomend it for someone whose just trying to have a good time. I hope you have a good time with Jack Herer, love you. Bye”
“Absolutely LOVE! Smooth and burns great! Vaping is amazing”
“Really helps with anxiety and panic attacks.”

“From the aroma to it's high, love everything about jack.
Buds had a distinct earthy and piney smell, with a  touch of citrus when ground up.
Dense buds full of trichomes. 
Love the euphoric and clear headed high, doesnt cloud your thoughts like other strains. Accompanied by a gentle and mellow body high as well. Effects hit almost instantly, last 2-3 hours with no comedown feels.
A very versatile strain.”

“So far it's my number one strain as far as a must have to help me get through a day of hard work. My fatigue and anxiety diminish
and my head stays clear enough for me to solve problems.”

“Tried a honey oil, but was a pretty distinct high so would expect to find flowers would have the same effect.
Scent wise at least in the case of this oil strongly pine and eucalyptus scented.
Effect wise tingly band behind the eyes and surprisingly a mellow body buzz.  Relaxed, but no lack of energy.  In fact moving around feels so effortless I tend to get a lot done.  Mind RACES for the first five minutes then settl...”

“My go to daytime smoke! Instantly puts a smile on my face and it really does get me motivated to be creative.  Great for doing art, going for a swim, snow boarding, reading,nature hikes etc A+ strain!”
“Really nice on muscle spasms”
“Put me down but not in a fun way”
“for me this was a nice easy high. I don't feel high I just feel alert and at my best.”
“Piney peppery smell. Draw is thin-mint cookie. Earthy and chocolatey. Effects were cerebral and focused”
“Really enjoyed my time with this bud. Got me very creative and focused!”

“This is what I call “clean your house” strain. This makes me get stuff done, lots of energy and willingness to want to complete tasks I put off. One of my top strains that I always keep on hand - highly recommend for everyone!”
“Great go to”

“I absolutely love this strain, enough to take the damn time to write a review of it. I am the survivor of a Traumatic Brain Injury and have been utilizing medicinal cannabis for over 20 years. I am a proud burner badgewearer and stoner of stoners while never being stoned because I have had an injury. This particular Sativa strain that I purchased from Green Cross Cannabis is only 18% and it is packing just what it ne...”
“This strain does everything I look for in a sativa. It's very uplifting, keeps you focused, you're extremely happy and your eyes feel very heavy. Smells fruity, tastes earthy. A really good strain.”
“5/10 nope”

“gave a very aggressive happy high, a mellow hunger and no desire to make,  this is lazy weed, it make you want to do nothing but eat and sleep,  and thats good for me since I've got issues eating and sleeping. fantastic taste, like a sweet chem taste.”
“All time favorite. You can never go wrong with this wonderful Sativa. Makes me productive, social and not much of a couch-lock. Enjoy this strain while doing chores or dull activities.”
“Good. Mild Sativa, a little jittery but def has energy. Good for depression.”

“This is a great strain for me. I can smoke it when I'm a bit sleepy and want to have some regenerated energy, yet it doesn't make me too hyper or anxious like some others do. I felt that the taste was pretty generic honestly, but I've never been the best at describing strain tastes unless they stick out considerably to me. Makes me feel pretty uplifted mood-wise and it's not harsh on the lungs. I also noticed it help...”

“I grew the Jack Herer from seedsman seeds, stayed medium size and didn't stretch to much in flower, finished around 5 FT tall, grown in Pro-Mix HP with advanced nutes. there's lots of different Phenos but the one I have is very fruity with denser buds, the high is very fast and uplifting. the aroma of fruit is also the flavor as well....would be very good for creative thinking and if Micro dosing perfect for Depressi...”
“This shit smacks”
“felt uplifting and focused. Helped get stuff done”
“Feels decent but DAMN, this is so tasty!!! I love the spicy pine flavor of this strain.”

“Let me tell you, I use the original Jack Herer it has been refined to perfection by Bedrocan. The feeling you get from this strain you can't explain it, you just have to try it for yourself. I HIGHly recommend it. P.S I can explain it but why ruin the medical magic, lets just say if you need to take on the world this is the strain to do it with :) Thank You Tweed/Bedrocan for making this available”
“The best I feel like I’m floating but yet relaxed.  Love it.”
“Heavy hitter, head was in the clouds after three hits.”

“Pre-legal days, this used to be a frequent option, or at least things called Jack Herer. Pretty much anything with a pine scent seemed to get that label. Tended to be poorly grown outdoor more often than not and as a result the strain got a bad label for causing paranoia. Decided to try some out from my dispensary, and got some exceptionally grown Jack that really changed my mind about this strain altogether. Awesome...”
“I had to write again about this strain because it's my new go to" medicine. Ive had this strain several different ways. When I smoke it through a bong
column4: I get a slow creepy fog that comes over me in the first 10-20 minutes. It sometimes follows with anxiety
column5: and I have had several anxiety attacks from com-busting this herb. I use cannibis for several ailments
column6: one notable is Anxiety
column7: lol. But I still liked to smoke i...”"

column3: “I had “high hopes” for this strain. It’s been around for years, figured we couldn’t go wrong. Not so much. A wonderfully smooth smoking strain for sure. But the promised high never fully blossomed. The only reason for the 4 star rating is the smokeability.”
“Great for the multitasker, not for some1 who is already over active, it will make you have symptoms of ADD, lol. But a wonderful party of the mind and soul uplifter! RIP Jack !”

“Was lucky enough to get a pre-roll from The Grow to try and yes this Namesake did not disappoint. Helped to smooth out a bit of anxiety I was feeling, and helped motivate me to get stuff done. Very nice effects.  It was a little harsh to smoke. Definitely would try it again... Great daytime meds!”
“Everyone likes Jack Herer.  Your typical everyday Sativa?  Not so.  Give it a try and you’ll see why.   You know why I like Jack?  Cause when everything else fails Jack will be there for you.”

A bit too energetic, but without the focus to be productive. Great for a party and socializing in a micro dose. Very unremarkable. I kept hoping it would get better. Had it in flower form both vaped and in a joint.”

“Best high of my life. After taking a few hits, and not being very satisfied. I was soon hit with a thc uppercut. I was shot into another universe entirely. I was mind fucked for about 15 minutes, but after that very comfortable, yet functional high. Great for social situations, and other activities. At the end for me I was a little sleepy in my opinion definitely more of a hybrid than sativa. Amazing strain worthy of...”

“Not good at low doses, but on high ones it's a good high.

Without properly high dose the effect is such that your mind is very active, but without the desired effect of deep overfocusing. So you end up just thinking annoyingly much, even so that it prevents you from enjoying even a movie or an episode of Animal Planet.

On high dose the effect is more desired one, only with a slight note of distorientation, but whic...”

“It's been a while since I had a really good quality Sativa. I've mostly been coming across a lot of Kush and   heavy Indica strains. So I was particularly excited when my friend informed me that Jack Herer was circulating through town. At first I didn't really believe it would be top notch Herer, but that morning at 7 a.m. he came over to give me a little sample of his, and boy was it top notch. Immediately after sch...”
“I used this as a day time strain to help with my arthritis pain. It has a really mellow feel. I'm a new user, so I got a bit of a buzz, but I wasn't stoned. Just relaxed and happy.”

“This weed made me super energetic but relaxed at the same time (if that makes sense lol). This weed, unlike most weed, doesn’t leave you feeling groggy on your come down, it leaves you feeling refreshed and relaxed. One of the best Sativa’s i’ve had by far. be safe and have fun!!!!”

“Great strain! Very strong cerebral high. The effects can be felt within 15 mins or so of smoking. It is a creeper, so take it easy if you have a low tolerance or if you're still figuring out dosage.”
“I had a wax pen with this strain and immediately noticed the earthy and pine flavors. I felt my anxiety slip away and was in a fantastic mood for the rest of the night.”

“Jack is a very interesting strain. One good pull on a  vape pen concentrate and the effects are almost non existent at first. It takes a few min to roll up to where you want to be in a very nice mellow way. Energized and very clear headed, it is easy to start your day off in a great mood!  Used in this way, the side effects listed are very minimal as well. I do not get dry mouth or eyes until I take several pulls in ...”

“I've made use of this strain during the day a few times, and I get headachey each time. Not A+ considering I'm trying to avoid headaches in the first place. That said, is a really good balance between a cerebral high and a body high. For someone who doesn't struggle with headaches as much, I would recommend!”
“Mellow, able to function and be productive with minimal head cloudiness and improved mood and anxiety.”
“First time smoking very warm feeling and melted stress and depression away pot is awesome!”
“Mellow, able to function and be productive with minimal head cloudiness and improved mood and anxiety.”
“First time smoking very warm feeling and melted stress and depression away pot is awesome!”
“Really powerful high. The high itself hits you like a truck. I liked using this on a lazy day.”
“pretty mellow”
“Don't usually buy sativa but this was a lovely smoke and I'd definately buy it again.!”
“A clear-headed up beat high! Great for dancing, socializing with friends or a night out. I sometimes get a little anxious when high and I have never felt that way on Jack. A+”

“Jack is my new nickname. I can use this either before writing or while tracking guitar. Focused. Inspiring. No matter what J.H. has got me covered for each productive  day this week, and just.. for the rest of the year.”

“My Go To Wake Up and fuck shit up strain. 
I'm a bodybuilder who suffers from knee tendonitis and back pain... I am also one of the most laziest people to ever exist... 
but I've made it this far because when I feel down, lazy, un-creative, not like myself, before an exam, Etc. I turn to my best friend Mr.Jack Herrer. Best WakeMeUp Strain.”
“today's work went quite smooth dew to Jack. I had the uplifted energetic High i was seeking with with a clear-head to accomplish my work.”

“STAY ON TARGET, LUKE

I am more into fruity strains. But this makes you so focussed with a clear and creativ mind. I wrote two concepts in a night. 

My five cups of esspresso”

“Sin duda un clásico, una Sativa que hay que probar. Un sabor muy rico con un pegue impresionante, muy fuerte, muy rapido, bien Sativa, nada de quedarse dormido. Una cepa para repetir y volver a testear.”
“I use this strain when I’m studying. It works for me.”
“Love this buzz”

“Wow what a treat, had not had any Jack for over a year, vaping for the first time I went with Jack Herer live resin, wise choice in my opinion, needless to say my old friend did not disappoint, Zero pain from joint disease in my ankles and knees, energetic, creative, full body high for me, Jack Herer is like a fine wine, without question one of my favorite strains”

“Surprisingly relaxing for a sativa! It's a very slowing euphoria, but it makes me focused. That skunky smell is obvious before and after smoking. It's a great strain if you need an apatite, want to make media epic, with a bit of creativity~”
“Sativas usually make me too energetic, even anxious. Jack Herer is an exception - I feel warm, awake, and even my angry stomach has chilled out a bit. Definitely would smoke again.”
“It was a good hi monent and good munchies but the all creative part was missing”

“I know that JH is classified as a Satuva but it functions as an Indica for me. This in my opinion only does not clear my thoughts. It in fact makes me get the rest that I need without aches and pains. JH is potent and not really a great starter for a newb. If you’re seeking pain relief this will do the trick. Just ease into it if you’re new to MJ. 

Peace and Grace”
“This made me so energetic. I could do anything. I would really liked this sativa mostly from the body feeling.”
“great strain, i really enjoyed it”
“taste good smells good burns good, all around great sativa”
“Love it!!! My wife loved it!! Totally recommend this strain .. If your in New Mexico follow the road to UltraHealth (Dispensary)💯👍🏾❤️🔥”
“Purchased some at Greener Grasses in Woodlawn neighborhood. Enjoyed it immensely buds were well trimmed and prices were good.Store was clean and well stocked will definitely return”
“good sativa, great high A”
“doesn't have the best taste but gets you high and hungry!”
“Potent, narcotic-like strain. Reminds me of being on opiates. Although it's a sativa it's so relaxing that it's hard not to drift off to sleep. Good stuff.”
“smoked a Gram and I was off to school best mist none paranoid high I have ever had and its just so uplifting wish that I just got more of it”
“Great strain. Perfect after work smoke. Nice high and can still be functional.”

“This is the most amazing Sativa I have ever smoked.  It hits hard and it hits fast with a strong cerebral buzz that will have you thinking about Plato's Republic or the creation of the universe.  This strain is the Thinking Man's" strain
column4: in that it really expands your mind and gets the creative juices flowing again.  If you have a high IQ and you love to think about lofty ideas
column5: then this Jack Herer Sativa is for y...”"

column3: “I prefer fruity strains but this one tastes really nice and is really strong, made some crazy beats on it”

column3: “I smoked a joint with a few buddy's then took one moderate sized bong toke and I was tripping out. I was hallucinating but in a good way. It gave me a very chill vibe for a sativa and I was able to go to bed when I wanted. Great strain!!”

“This strain was surprising.  For the low THC content it really kicked after a few minutes and keep kicking after a few hours.  It is a very impressive strain I would suggest to smoke in subtle amounts”

Thank you to whom ever created it. 👍”

Best way I could describe the high is chill". That's it. Nothing more
column4: nothing less. It just puts me in a very nice
column5: chill vibe.

column2: I got absolutely no anxiety or paranoia

“I personalty love J.H its a on the the go head high, that will not get you so stoned that you can not walk and talk and remember to feed the dog (dogs like food y'all did ya know that? well shit son now you do) its a citrus meets tea leaf (light tea think pear tea or white tea.do not know what that shit is? well go take your happy ass to the nearest  grocery store and buy some ya primitive) Jack here has never made m...”

“Great sativa!  I’d give it 5 stars but I like a more pungent flavor personally.  This is a very earthy flavor.  😋 Won’t put you on the couch.  Definitely dose before work to have a happy go lucky day!  Happy toking!”
“Tastes great, amazing happy all over high. One of my favorite yet right along with blue dream”
“I LOVE this strain! Its the best sativa I have ever tried! I love the high from it! I feel so creative and I'm in such a good mood when I smoke it. Its amazing!!”

“Cloud 9 for about 3 hours. Perfect to escape to an other dimention. Als good as cbd drops.”

“I have a love/hate relationship with Jack. JH is the right strain to medicate with when it's morning and you have a lot of stuff to do, and have to keep your head on while doing it. It's one of the few that really give me an energy buzz, and the high is very clear-headed. 

Jack Herer is the wrong strain if I'm trying to have a laid back day, and for me doesn't work well for anxiety. If I hit it too hard, I can actua...”

“I love this strain with all of my heart. It just puts you in the right place to get things done, feel great, happy and not super euphoric or tunnel vision  like other sativa strains. Love the clear head high this strain gives me. Amazing focus! 
Number one on my list.”

“Awesome stuff. Super strong, beautiful buds, decent taste. I'm a strain snob and I loved this shit. High was a little short but awesome for partying, watching comedies, hanging out with the boys. I really recommend smoking some of this and listening to music! And prepare to not feeling tired after coming down from its high.”
“Really love Jack, you get really high without any paranoïa.”
“This was the first weed I ever purchased. It was dank and made me hungry. Good, solid weed.”

“This is one of my favorite strains ever. I love medicating with this stain in the day time as it promotes a cerebral and creative high! The flower smells of citrus and the taste is smooth. A great day time smoke or one to get the creative juices flowing!”

“I absolutely adore Jack Herer. I started using it for a daytime strain to help me focus and work, and oh man, did it deliver. I always tell people that smoking this makes me feel like I just took a Limitless pill, especially with microdosing. It just makes me so focused and motivated.”

On a different side note, I wish under the category,...”
“Good for getting stuff done but doesn't have the heavy narcotic knock out.”
“Good for getting stuff done but doesn't have the heavy narcotic knock out.”
“my gosh! sooo enjoyable and long lasting. made everything wonderful and fun but still could rationalize and function normally”

“This strain is hands down my favorite, and easily stands out amongst other high quality strains, such as Blue Dream, Sour Diesel, and assorted others that I have used. The high is near perfect, with the ideal mix of sillyness and heightened mental capacity, as well as a soothing, yet energizing body high. Truly an all star amongst strains, and I highly recommend it to anyone for both Daytime and nighttime use.”
“Very nice taste great for daytime.”
“I’m sleepy... and my mind goes on tangents. Time feels like it’s going by really quickly but no time has passed. And I’m hungry but I can’t climb down my loft bed. Still fun though, very creative.”

“I would give Jack Herer 4.8 out of 5 if I could- it’s a great strain. But I don’t see many people commenting on what ailment they are treating, and thus the effectiveness of that strain on their specific ailment.

First off, I’m not a doctor or a scientist. I’m simply a mid-twenties something female (pretty normal lifestyle for people my age) that smokes to treat anxiety and some other negative feelings and obsession...”
“One of my new favourite sativas with an excellent, energetic high. Quite potent but not debilitating. Smooth smoke and beautiful smelling flowers.”
“Refreshingly Spicy Mango ...only clocked in at 14% but it held its weight. Always a good choice.”

“The smell of this strain reminds me of the soft plastic fishing lure worms that I used growing up.  It tastes a little odd, kind of artificial but at the same time earthy (kind of like a car air freshener).”
“i liked it”

“This is my go-to for depression. It helps the negative feelings go away and replaces them with happiness and a feeling of calm. What knocked it down a star is that after a half-hour to an hour of smoking it, I feel INCREDIBLY tired, more so than when I use a straight-up indica. I haven't had this issue with other sativas, so I don't know why this one makes me sleepy. Very unfortunate since I wanted this for daytime u...”
“jack is a really nice sativa. great for mornings”
“Awesome high great head high on my top 10”

“I fully recommend this for anyone suffering with depression and anxiety like me. When I don't feel like socializing or doing doing anything, I take this and I feel a lot better, almost to the point of conquering the world! I've found few strains so far that really do the trick for me, this is one of them.”

“Kinda like a small coffee in the morning. Definitely a nice cerebral high that doesn’t  allow you to get to lost in the flood of thoughts like a strong sativa strain. Mix between sweet and earthy aroma. If you need a pic me up joint this is definitely the strain you would wanna roll up.”
“one of my favorite strains. smells like sweet tea or lemonade or some shit like that...awesome buzz and amazing taste. very happy, relaxed, high. good shit.”
“one of my favorite strains. smells like sweet tea or lemonade or some shit like that...awesome buzz and amazing taste. very happy, relaxed, high. good shit.”

“This is a fantastic herb for the functional & creative person. 

I am a natural bodybuilder and this helps me with focus, energy and pump during training.

“This strain is amazing! The flavor is so tasty and the effects are wonderful. Uplifting, euphoric, anxiety reducing, and it really helps with my creativity as an artist. I would highly recommend this strain for anyone with anxiety or depression...or an artistic block. 😂👌🙌”

“I love some jack. The finest jack herer will have a cooling frosty smoke with a clean piney flavor. The smell is piney, and also frosty or cool" smelling. The high is all smiles. It's not overly racy and it's also by no means lazy. This classic is truly some happy weed that never gets old.”"
“Decent sativa strain; uplifting buzz that is strong but not overpowering. Breaks up leafy & has a smooth taste/smoke.”
“I really like this one the best it made me really happy and I suffer with depression and ptsd plus bi polor and it really helps me stay at a happy meadum. ..”

“First test 5/19/12

“Love this strain. Perfect in every way. The concentrates do it an amazing justice. The flavor is very unique and tastes like heaven! Enjoy!! ✌”
“Sleep educed.”
“Sleep educed.”

“Jack Herer is quite nice. It starts with a bit of dizziness and a wonderful tingly feeling and goes to a nice energetic euphoria with psychedelic aspects but little paranoia. Highly recommended, one of my faves.”
“Clean and aware”

“My go to for a pick me up in the late morning or afternoons. First time using a live resin from the dispensary and it is great. 
It is energizing without being jittery. Puts me in the best mood and clears my mind. I suffer from depression, adhd, and anxiety. This does not make me anxious at all as some other Sativas have. 
Give it a try you won’t regret it!”

“This stuff is a strait up sativa buzz that was purely cerebral. At one point I had a panic attack from this bud and had to sit down for a while. Definitly some of the strongest bud i have ever smoked if grown well.”

“This strain has a very relaxed and happy high to it. It makes you think vividly and puts you in a mood to sit and reflect on yourself. Whenever you take a big enough hit, you’ll definitely regret it for about 15 mins tho. It will give you the occasional paranoid stoned thoughts after a certain point.”
“Wakes me up from any level of sleepiness! Good for being productive! Or just getting into the zone and focusing on something.”
“one of my favorite personal strains. very energized with a strong long-lasting buzz”
“I feel like this is the Whole Foods of marijuana. Clean taste, green and earthy. Perfect blend of feeling perplexed but euphoric. A must try!”

“This strain is instantly energizing. I smoked some of this and cleaned my whole apartment. Really focused me up but very relaxing at the same time. Tingly body buzz that lasts hours. Very potent strain.”
“this great dope  joins our expectation .....the champagne of the sativas. uplifted and talkative effects long lasting pleasure.”
“Great strain for me”
“my 'go to' strain.  a really nice daytime buzz”

“As for as a terpene profile this,strain is boss. I bought an ounce of mid shelf flower which I normally don't do. I was amazed at the lemon scent and flavor. I usually prefer something more sativa dominant but I'd love to but this grown by ace”

“My favorite sativa dominant strain. Delivers a jolting cerebral buzz and due to its uplifting nature you can toke this all day without feeling drowsy in the aftermath. Would highly recommend for smokers who enjoy getting as high as possible without the sleepy/sedative/hunger inducing effects of other strains.”

“This is my favorite daytime strain so far.  Has a earthy kind of taste and gives a really nice lift to the body.  I can do 1 or 2 hits from a one-hitter and I’m still good and functional.  This is my go to strain for getting things done around the house that I really do not want to do.  The munchies really aren’t an issue with Jack Herer.  Just a nice  focused buzz. A great look to the oil as well.”

“Pulled about .2 of rosin out of a 2g nug today with excellent results.  Rosin was almost clear on the paper, gathered into honey coloured crystals, and hardened to a lemon-yellow shatter when pressed and cooled to room temp.  Effects were very satisfying.  Tingling body buzz and uplifting cerebral effects.  Highly recommended for those of you into rosin tech!”

“Jack Herer. What more can be said about this incredibly popular strain. My go to sativa hands down. Excellent for daytime use, perfectly balanced cerebral elevation. If you are a musician, or love music, Jack is the one. If you haven’t tried this strain, what are you waiting for?”
