“Good day strain that gets you moving.”
“energetic”

“As my first strain as a medical patient, I was blown away at it's potency. I didn't really know what to expect. Little goes a long way. Used it to treat anxiety and depression. I was pretty impressed and would definitely get some more when my local dispensaries start carrying it again. #420sweepstakes”

“This is by far the best strain I've ever tried! As an entertainer, I find this strain has the best creativity boost! I usually smoke before taking a shower just to get my mind right. Best for wake and bake. #420sweepstakes”
“It made me feel confident and smooth. Very mellow and easy. I didn't feel drowsy. Just look forward to a great day.”
“Jack Herer...like a box of chocolates, you never know what you'll get, but you sure won't be left with regret.”
“This strain is awesome.  The couch lock isn't too bad and I really enjoy the chill way it makes you feel”
“This is a great day time strain for those that suffer from anxiety and/or depression. It provides a calming, yet productive, high. My go-to when I'm preparing for a busy day.”

“Jack Herer is a crazy strain that has left me high all day during my travels in Portland. I smiled 2/3s j's a gram joint and I've been high since noon. It's night 9 at night. If you smoked a lesser amount in dire it'd be fine but definitely plan to be high a while.”

“My all time favorite strain. I rarely review things, although I should. Jack Herer, however, is worth it. I wish the strain was more popular in medical dispensaries, so definitely grab it if you have the chance.”
“This is what puts me to sleep at night! Very nice high that creeps up on me after a few minutes! Very beautiful flowers!”

“I had this strain twice one night I left a friend of mine stay over he had jack herer we smoked two joints and a bowl pack that night and one blunt the next morning as well as a bowl pack and sage cone of bud I don't know the strain of it was one of the best highs of my entire life and I would recommend it to anyone definitely in the top five strains I've ever smoked”
“By far my favorite strain. This is my go to and I have yet to get tired or bored of it. You feel it instantly and it sticks around for a while !”
“Great flavor for great effects and morning use.”

“Functional daytime strain. Relaxing and mildly stimulating.

I only used moderate doses, but it's remarkably clear-headed with no paranoia or anxiety. I could do anything I do sober.”
“The version i purchased was a Unicorn Flavor of Jack Herer. A sweet, fruity, cooling flavor with a burst of euphoria. I enjoyed the concentrated version, looking to try another flavor though.”
“Jack Herer, long and fair, he's always a good, solid strain.”
“From The Green Cross, SF CA”
“Undoubtedly my favorite sativa of all time. Gets you jacked...no pun intended. A must-try. Strong sativa high + undertones of indica make this strain outstanding.”
“Very uplifting. Unique smell. Nice taste.”
“Waiting for some time to taste this guy. Fruity to the core. Worth the wait. Good geek going .”
“Might be my favorite ever. Makes me very thoughtful.”
“Pretty bomb stuff looked great nice stoney high.”

“Jack Herer (cannabis) is one of few legendary strains I have tried.  To put this particular treat of a strain in a nutshell, it's just proper weed.  It he its own distinct flavors yet fits the description of good pot to a T.  Not to strong in the right amounts.  Damn near a perfect sativa.. The only negative i have found is a faster than average strain tolerance. A+”
“A great strain that I got from 14er's in Boulder. Little goes a really long way! The father of growing has his name on one of the best strains Ive experienced. Thank you Jack and thank you 14er's.”

“Let me state my bias: I like the kind of stuff that picks you up, wakes you up and gives you a flight of ideas.

I'm reviewing Purple Jack Herer, so not sure if it's the same thing everyone else is reviewing. 

PJH is pretty good but a bit milder than what I'm looking for. I really want to spin.”
“This strain was really nice. It had a strong sativa high but with a Jack Herer feel to it. This strain was excellent :)”
“Eh. I had this stuff at the Greenhouse in Amsterdam, and given that fact just assumed it'd be awesome. Boy was I wrong. It was like marijuana light". Initial euphoria and focus of a Sativa
column4: with a tinge of a body high/heavy eyes of an Indica - which I'd assume is rare in a pure Sativa. Maybe this particular strain wasn't any good
column5: but I found it to be pretty JV. Smells wonderful though
column6: and tastes smooth and light. ...”"

column3: “this bud gave me a very Euphoric high very up lifted.”
“Good Ol' Jack. the smell.almost stung my nose. some really well grown jack can be on of the nest strains out there. favorite starin.”

“My absolute favorite strain for the day. Picked up a gram of shatter and it smells so citrusy it’s almost like candy. The anxiety relief is amazing and you can smoke on it all day without getting too stupid. Perfect if you have a day full of plans and want to feel good.”

“I tried Jack Herer for the first time 3 days ago and the high was really good, I was expecting a great high from other reviews and it delivered. I did however start to get a nauseating headache towards the peak of the high and it lingered for a few hours. Smoking this particular flower a second time, didn't bring the same results. The high was great and no headaches were had. All in all, this strain of marijuana is a...”
“Fantastic smoke. Vary earthy and just true to it name and hold a nice high last all day.”
“Great taste and high!!!”
“Really nice strain, definitely worth trying. I felt less stressed, relaxed and happy, as well as being a bit hungry, but not too bad. Recommend for sure!”
“one of the best sativas i have come across. ..”

“ONE OF MY ALL TIME FAVORITE STRAINS & one of my TOP 3 Strains to Start My Day With!" I would have to say it's quite an enjoyable cerebral high that when mixed with a Strong Indica or OG Strain & smoked out of same bowl adds legs to the high results in one of the most enjoyable fades I can consistently recreate ANYTIME!!!! - AS LONG AS YOU HAVE A GREAT PHENOTYPE OF THE TWO STRAINS
column4: you're GOLDEN
column5: otherwise disregard ...”"

column3:
“Really smooth. Creeps up on you from the gut, but in a calm floating in the water type of way. 

Smells delicious! 

No couch lock!! Just a focused chill mindset.”
“Spicy with Piney Undertones.”
“Having tried this strain, I am planning on having some on hand as often as I can. Good taste, good high, what can I say?”
“Never disappointed with this strain, no matter mission or state of mind”
“Wonderful taste and aroma. Takes a few to hit you but shit when it does you are feeling tooooo nice!”
“great sativa uplifting buzz and unique taste”
“I used the med-west pure gold wax made from the Jack Herer strain and it is excellent. very uplifting and is great for depression and appetite loss.”
“I am loving this strain. it's extra tasty pine flavor is awesome. Keeps uplifted and observant all day.”
“good ass hell”
“Splendidly uplifting! The mental buzz that comes with this is tingly and pleasant and makes life a big bag of smiles.”

“Pleasing high, bit of a creeper for me.  Unlike other people, this strain is not my go-to for an energetic wake n bake.  I definitely get a boost in creativity and observation, but my body feels like a lead brick.  Strong piney smell and taste, think camping :-)  JH is not a staple for me, but I do enjoy it from time to time.  Solid strain.”
“Im writing this review with a Jack Herer spliff in my hand, im a musician and this weed can keep me going all night, the Effects" info on this weed is quite accurate
column4: i would add that i get very hungry everytime after smoking. Very creative n uplifting high
column5: just went from smoking Mango (Indica) to this so i would say that this weed definetly hits harder. I love sativa so i give this weed a 4 out of 5. Jah Bless /Ki...”"

column3: “Great smoke! Got me up on my feet and movin'it!”
“Love the trichome-y large buds. They are generally fairly fluffy, which I don't enjoy; however, jack just has that certain taste and high that you don't get from anything else.”
“One of my favorite strains so far, smoked it, got stupidly high after smoking and proceeded to laugh a lot with my friends 10/10 would smoke again”
“Jack Herer is one of my favorite strains and they grew and cured this one perfectly. Great Sativa”
“Top five strain for me ..makes me laugh at everything ..very happy stuff some of the first stuff I tried ..love it!!”

“This is a great stain for rolling a joint and going on a road trip, or sharing with friends. Just an overall good-time high. I can't seam to get enough of this one. It has that nice, happy, calm feeling but while maintaining a very clear head, so you could do just about anything while on it, making it a great companion for anxiety and stress. I don't often get the munchies, but for some reason I did a little bit with...”

“Ahh... Jack Herer... I had heard stories about The Best Sativa" from friends and sought out the strain for months at local Seattle rec shops before finally finding it a few blocks from my work. (Go figure
column4: right?) The high is.... different. I am fully functioning
column5: creative
column6: more talkative
column7: light headed.... it almost feels like a better version of me. When I smoke Jack Herer I feel like I'm more charismatic

column3: “it's a solid strain. Energy and happiness to all who smoke it. I'm not usually a fan of the earthier strains but this one held up to the hype.”
“very good Sativa, pine smell, not as hard strain of weed like everyone says but keeps you awake, good for wake and bake.”
“Really great strain. I get mainly an energized head high with some body effects. A very euphoric and creative high. I'd say this is one of my favorite strains!”
“Nice blend”
“Great head high”

“This strain has a really great smell. Consisting of real earthy tones suggesting a mellow after taste. It smokes smooth unlike many other strong strains leaving you with a satisfying experience and not a harsh cough.”

“Me and my mate just smoked a fat doobie of this grade and it's not the strongest but it definitely matches all of the facts on leafly! Uplifting, energetic and euphoric feelings complement the non-fruit earthy taste :D we love weed and this is up there with our most loved strains #supportthecause”
“The effects are good but this strain smells like someone pooped in the vaporizer.”
“Love the feeling and still got the substance”
“i bought a nice bag of this today first time with this strain it has a good high i recommend others to smoke this”
“fantastic strain to bring your mood up.  I usually take a rip or 2 before I go out.  makes the night that much better.  If you can find it..don't wait..it goes fast.”
“It is far from a bad bud it's pretty good the high is ok it's smooth but the taste is off”
“Smoke this and get started on all those projects you've been putting off. This has a nice, clear headed, short lasting high.”
“Smooth but strong taste it breaks down lovely”
“This strain has a distinct taste, and it certainly does a wonder on depression and anxiety.”
“Very focused, positive and clean high. Not to strong and it doesnt freak u out 👍🏽”

“having this for the first time in an oil and OMG it hit hard! wasn't expecting that from this but it was 
like inhaling Pinesol through the pen, then after exhale I started feeling this sativa like energy and happiness. absolute great daytime use to get things done!”

“Love the strain. This is the 4th time I've had it and every time I've had this warmth that wraps around my head. Feels great. Makes me want to go walk around or somthn. Leads to good conversation and works well with a lot of peeps. Honestly I'm chillen with 3 others right now and it's omazing. Other than feeling a slight headache and hunger, es pretty güd.”
“clean and great high from this strain, will be getting some more in the near future ;)”

“A perfect example of a sativa .
the buds are soft and green , as a joint smooth but with a tinge at the end .
The mood is indulging between high and background focusing .
You can move around with it .
Good for thinking and creativity .”
“Very smooth and good taste. Very solid cerebral high, just very bad cotton mouth and eye dry. Great chilled strain to smoke whenever.”

“Classic strain right here. One of the more notorious hybrids named after an amazing person and activist. Jack is great for breeding hence why u see it everywhere. I love the evergreen pine aroma this stuff exudes, its straight christmas. Clear and uplifting this is without a doubt daytime get stuff done meds, and it does it so well.”
“Amazing strain! Truly annihilated my anxiety! It made me happy, focused, creative, and all around in a great mood! This is must try!!!”
“Love this strain, keeps me awake, helps with tasks and makes feel more creative after smoking”
“Great strain to take away a migraine, but coming down from the high can be extremely exhausting. Almost had another headache from coming down from the high.”
“smokes well and nice mild piney taste!”
“I really like it! Relaxing but uplifting. Maximize your sences... I'm listening the music in a deeper way finding the meaning to it.”
“Decent flavour and fairly quick acting for pain and sluggishness! Would highly recommend”
“pretty dope strain ~.~”

“Jack is always good. I am constantly fatigued and Jack Herer is an awesome little pick me up. It also helps me get rid of any stomach pains without making me ultra-hungry.  I recommend this sativa!!”

“This was my first time trying Mr. Jack and I must say it was quite the experience. It started off just like a Plane cruising  down the  runway and eventually hitting its peak just before take off. This is the strain that I have been looking for. It was recommended by a friend who thought that Mr. Jack would help my PTSD and Anxiety. I must admit that I am a Indica guy due to my anxiety, so I was a little nervous tryi...”
“The way you start to perceive the colors around you is amazing!”
“This strain is an excellent painkiller. The high is mindnumbing and feels deliciously relieving for pain and anxiety. Very spacey.”
“a great strain to make into butter, very potent stuff”
“Good strain to start THE day”
“This is my get shit did strain. I feel very energized and ready to do anything. A small head high and tons of energy. Great for wake and bake or during the day with shit to do”

“At first I was just a regular high, thought the strain was nothing special, then about 10 mins into blunt it hit me. A weird tingly sensation hit my entire body at once and I knew I was stoned. I normally prefer indicate but the potency of this sativa earned it a high ranking on my favorites list”

“this is my 2nd batch of this smooth puffin delight. people u need to draw it in mon. this strain smells like a northern Canadian forest in spring. the clean earthy wood taste to finish! Ahh..
get ready for a fast cerebral buzz followed by euphoria and joyfull action
pain is reduced. great batch at tilray.
goodly pricing this time. happy holdays”
“takes weight off your shoulders”

“Great sativa-dominant hybrid, I picked up some frosty nugs of Jack Herer from Tilray and they smell like mustard, taste like pine, and give me a stress-free, focused, cerebral high. not too sativa, it doesn't keep me up at night, helps put me in a good relaxed mood before bed, and then knocks me out proper. great all-around day or night strain for me personally.”

“The buds were pleasant, but not sexy, could've just been my place in line though.  There was a decent taste, but again, not blown away like I was hoping from the reviews, it was not distinct. The baked goods that came from it were delicious with a sustained high that was mellow without the sleepies.”
“Effects are subtle and not extreme. I felt very relaxed but still energetic high. I felt tingling sensations through my head, arms and upper body. Very good strain I would smoke again.”
“Tops   A great choice for people just starting to smoke”

“The bud was noticeably more plush and brown/red in colour than your average flower, and smelled like sweet, pine and spices. The flowers were noticeably sparkly with resin, and very sticky to the touch. 
I could definitely feel it in my head.
Great for playing video games,  I'm very impressed with the graphics right now.”
“Practical sativa.  Great taste.  Strong high.”
“Must try you have to watch disjointed on Netflix after your smoke this honestly the best.”
“Great strain to start your morning”
“Love this strain nice long high lasting a proxy 3 hours”

“One of my all time favorites. I prefer plants grown from the Sensi Seeds Phenotype-B of Jack Herer. The overwhelming citrus aroma of this particular version of the Jack Herer strain is absolutely lovey. If you have ADD and want to treat it with medical cannibis, this is the daytime medicine for you! Nothing better than a wake and bake with some Jack Herer to get your day going!”
“Tastes almost like a jasmine green tea”

“Most marijuana strains that I've used takes me into a roller coaster. I feel very happy one moment and then very depressed few minutes later. Jack Here gives you an uplifting happy feeling every time. This was grown by Phat Panda, I don't think its organic but its not bad.”
“Fantastic. It's a great city but that doesn't make you anxious whatsoever.”
“The excellent grade of cannabis, without problems grew up in the southern part of Russia.”

“Wow what a treat, had not had any Jack for over a year, vaping for the first time I went with Jack Herer live resin, wise choice in my opinion, needless to say my old friend did not disappoint, Zero pain from joint disease in my ankles and knees, energetic, creative, full body high for me, Jack Herer is like a fine wine, without question one of my favorite strains”

“I got Jack Herer #8 here in Illinois and I can say that I didn’t get much of the creative, clear headed feeling that is stated in the description BUT each person is different and who knows about the #8. I am not a huge joint smoker since my tolerance is pretty low and I end up having to put them out after two hits. This strain I felt right away and I have to say it felt more like an indica to me but it also gave me a...”

“I love some jack. The finest jack herer will have a cooling frosty smoke with a clean piney flavor. The smell is piney, and also frosty or cool" smelling. The high is all smiles. It's not overly racy and it's also by no means lazy. This classic is truly some happy weed that never gets old.”"
“This strain will put you in a good mood with tons of energy!”

“This strain is amazing! The flavor is so tasty and the effects are wonderful. Uplifting, euphoric, anxiety reducing, and it really helps with my creativity as an artist. I would highly recommend this strain for anyone with anxiety or depression...or an artistic block. 😂👌🙌”
“was wonderful for head and body relief, very relaxing”
“Jack Herer is my favorite strain to date. A couple small puffs and my mind feels like a took a shot of espresso. I love the energy of this strain!”
“Great smell and taste, love the way it smokes too and it's great for when I have to do things thru out the day. Just don't sit and smoke a lot CB you will not be getting anything done. 😄✌️”
“I laughed a lot & felt really happy”
“I love this strain more & more every time I smoke it....All the Jack strains are very calming but uplifting & energizing. A great comb for someone with anxiety. 💚💚💚”

“It's relaxing, yet uplifting!
Subtle earthy smoke.
Makes me feel content in the moment... My mind doesn't feel cloudy... I seem to concentrate better, more focused. Enjoyable during the day, as I've tried it at night.”
“I’m usually an Indica person .. but this here strain is the bomb.. i am definitely glad i decided to try this strain”
“All time favorite strain. Great, focused high. THIS is the cure for those with ADD/ADHD. Hit this in a pen every morning and you’re solid 🙌🏻 bless”
“Hands down my all time favorite sativa. Never have I been let down by jack.”
“I had bad experiences with that strain. I had continuous pain, eye fatigue. It's strong.”

“As for as a terpene profile this,strain is boss. I bought an ounce of mid shelf flower which I normally don't do. I was amazed at the lemon scent and flavor. I usually prefer something more sativa dominant but I'd love to but this grown by ace”
“Fantastic for 'coffee in the morning' style use! Effects last for a long time w/o any ill side effects. Just uplifted, good attitude and happy to be alive.”
“Refreshingly Spicy Mango ...only clocked in at 14% but it held its weight. Always a good choice.”

“Awesome stuff. Super strong, beautiful buds, decent taste. I'm a strain snob and I loved this shit. High was a little short but awesome for partying, watching comedies, hanging out with the boys. I really recommend smoking some of this and listening to music! And prepare to not feeling tired after coming down from its high.”
“The Best Uplifter hands down! Perfect for music festivals. It will make you euphoric and relaxed at the same time... I know it doesn’t make sense but that’s the point 👽”

“Great strain I just picked up my second batch of this stuff from a Colorado dispensary I will update after smoke. 

1st time I had this strain was in October 2017. Great clear but strong high. I smoked a pre-roll of this before going into the universal islands of adventure and man 👌🏾. Great for for daytime usage it won’t make you sleepy or groggy.”
“Second review but was consumed in concentrate form. Way more uplifting feeling and the taste really pops. Amazing strain to start the day or for lunch smoke break”
“Really really good for social setting, helps with social anxiety. A nice strain to light up with a group of friends.”
“coffee black,days plan,jack herer,ready set Go!!”

“I accidentally got my hands on an ounce of JH yesterday and smoked with a few friends.

We were blasting happy and upbeat music and passing it around. Was most definitely a GREAT experience. Everyone was extremely happy and had a pleasant experience. Even people that were depressed before smoking JH instantly felt better.

This is an extremely great strain for curing depression, anxiety, and any sort of similar probl...”

“This is the only sativa I’ve had so far that doesn’t give me anxiety or paranoia in social situations (of course, dosage is everything). Have only vaped oil, not flower, but so far, so good. Tastes great, too — cool & pine-y. :)”
“Tastes earthy!!”
“All time favorite. You can never go wrong with this wonderful Sativa. Makes me productive, social and not much of a couch-lock. Enjoy this strain while doing chores or dull activities.”
“Awesome!”
“Kudos to earlier reviews by mporter88 (2013)"
column4: "cretin71" (2016) and ":imnotsethrogen" (Sept. '17).  I am late arriving at this cerebral feast (7/1/37) that for years was referred to
column5: in my venue
column6: as "weed".  Oh my.  How far and fast you have generated a separate genre that allows the individual to experience "some of the most far out thoughts and the most personal insights." we have carried with us for generations....”"

column3: “What can you say baout Jack Herer? With it heavy coating of tricomes and brilliant orange hairs, with a citrus pine sent that is just outstanding. First bong hit I was greeted with a smooth a subtle flavor that becomes more and more bold with exhale. A clear but euphoric high, that really has one of those happy day type of feels. All around well bodied sativa that shows plenty of honor towered The Prince of Pot its n...”

“It’s great, I’m smoking it out of a bloom cartridge .5 
It honestly hits right away & it doesn’t have a bad taste. Would definitely recommend it to a friend!”
“It was a nice woody smell. And it hits you right when it needs to. Highly recommended.”
“Energetic, quick, spastic high. It's both fun and funny, with a slight tingle. Friday night vibes no matter the night.”

“Previously reviewed in concentrate/vapor form,now being reviewed in flower form.Solid cone shaped nugs that are darker green,with short red hairs.Smells like pine,and spices in the bag.Same while being smoked,only with an added woody scent.The taste follows the smell with pine,wood,and spice.Great strain for depression,and one of my favorite morning time sativa's.”
“Not what I was hoping. Just makes me dissociative and hungry. The effects feel nice when you're on them, but afterwards you can feel sick from eating too much.”

“Had this strain in a Soflogrow 500mg Disposable Vape Pen. Flavor was really nice, lots of limonene and terpene flavor and aroma comes through. Kind of a lemon, citrus, sage, oregano, cilantro flavor. Very appealing. 
Great energy, but potent with the vape pen. Don't get carried away smoking it a lot because it gets stony fast and sneaks up on you. Just 4 or 5 hits was enough for me to be functional but baked and I ha...”

“A very subtle high engulfs one‘s periphery as visual acuity appears to increase at a considerable speed. After taking three deep inhalations from a Zen Labs vape pen filled with Jack Herer concentrate, all tensions in the body faded and sore muscles had become very relaxed, while a rising fervour caused me to drop into the dazzling lines of Charles Baudelaire‘s »Wine and Hashish«. The effects of Jack Herer lend a fan...”
“I really liked this stuff, and I always underestimated it lmao. This strain made me more aroused than any other one but it also made me creative and want to paint”
“A solid head high but I’m not getting the same affects as other people. It does the trick but with fewer affects as similar strains.”
“fucked me up very uplifting you can tell that is a sativa from the first hit! very energizing and uplifting negative effect paranoia”

“Kinda like a small coffee in the morning. Definitely a nice cerebral high that doesn’t  allow you to get to lost in the flood of thoughts like a strong sativa strain. Mix between sweet and earthy aroma. If you need a pic me up joint this is definitely the strain you would wanna roll up.”
“One of my new favourite sativas with an excellent, energetic high. Quite potent but not debilitating. Smooth smoke and beautiful smelling flowers.”
“One of my new favourite daytime smokes with an excellent, energetic high. quite potent but not debilitating. Smooth smoke and beautiful smelling flowers.”

“I love this strain with all of my heart. It just puts you in the right place to get things done, feel great, happy and not super euphoric or tunnel vision  like other sativa strains. Love the clear head high this strain gives me. Amazing focus! 
Number one on my list.”

“Jack is a very interesting strain. One good pull on a  vape pen concentrate and the effects are almost non existent at first. It takes a few min to roll up to where you want to be in a very nice mellow way. Energized and very clear headed, it is easy to start your day off in a great mood!  Used in this way, the side effects listed are very minimal as well. I do not get dry mouth or eyes until I take several pulls in ...”

“This is probably my second favorite strain. Let me start off by saying that this weed smells great! It has a sweet almost like citrusy scent to it. When taking the hit, it's very smooth and easy. The high also gets very uplifting and relaxed at the same time.”

“Fucking good shit. Jack Herer is the perfect sativa for me. No body high whatsoever and you get this burst of energy and creativity. I wish I had access to it all the time but doesn’t come around a lot where I live. Great flavor also.”
“When I smoked this strain I had all clean and happy feelings. I always like to smoke this in the morning to make my day go by a little bit better.”

“I love the high in moderate amounts (a few hits off my 7pipe) 

But I can’t stand the taste! I noticed it more today when I used my bong.”
“Oh yeah this strain had me rolling! Very uplifting flower and has you relaxed for the come down and doesn’t have you crashing after”

“No basta con el sabor a madera, pino o tierra que indica la página para asegurar que es una buena planta, el olor, la forma en la que pasa a tus pulmones son buenas formas de asegurar eso. Po parte del olor, tiene relación al sabor pero de una forma más suave y dulce.
La forma en la que pasa a tus pulmones no tiene que ser fuerte ni picante porque si sientes ese ardor y calor al pasar significa no esta bien curada y ...”
“By far the best strain when it comes to having energy and feeling uplifting.”

“Let me tell you, I use the original Jack Herer it has been refined to perfection by Bedrocan. The feeling you get from this strain you can't explain it, you just have to try it for yourself. I HIGHly recommend it. P.S I can explain it but why ruin the medical magic, lets just say if you need to take on the world this is the strain to do it with :) Thank You Tweed/Bedrocan for making this available”

“gave a very aggressive happy high, a mellow hunger and no desire to make,  this is lazy weed, it make you want to do nothing but eat and sleep,  and thats good for me since I've got issues eating and sleeping. fantastic taste, like a sweet chem taste.”
“for me this was a nice easy high. I don't feel high I just feel alert and at my best.”

“Amazing strain. Ive had many different grows of it over the years. What i love about Jack is the great taste and burn. It has a nice cerebral start to the high, with suprisingly long lasting body vibes and euphoria for a sativa. Highly recommended.”
“Hurts your throat.”

“I fucken love JACK HERRER! 
This isn’t your mediocre herb in my opinion, I get tired of Og’s.. I just love that the smell is completely different from any strain and it stands out from any other flower. The high is elegant in a sense where you can focus but smoothly. I find myself work on college studies and go out without feeling tired but lifted.”

“me encanta el efecto energizante y llevadero que tiene y su sabor herbal dulce y mentolado con notas inciensadas! me gusta su efecto ya que al principio comienza siendo muy energetico y llevadero pero poco a poco v a agotando tus energias y dejando paso a un efecto mas relajante!”

“This strain will get you high af and feeling good. It's good for doing anything. Watching sports, being outdoors, work, etc. It will get you high to where you feel amazing but wont make your brain get all fogged up to where you don't know what you're talking about. I recommend not taking this strain before bed time too cuz I made that mistake and it kept me up all night no matter how hard I tried falling asleep. Enjo...”

“chill strain that puts you back in the couch, and you basically cant have a bad time, your happy, relaxed, hungry, and its amazing. you of course get cotton mouth, and i got a bit of fatigue but thats about all.”

“One of my favorite strains . 
Strong Sativa to take on the day . 
Had many cool adventures with this strain. The high never leaves your frontal lobe and the earthy sour taste keeps you tasting it well after you're done smoking . 
Thanks Johnnie Caleb at Herbal Wellness for the insight . Always a pleasure to get my medicine from HWC.”
“I'm soooooooooo high”

“in love”
“So uplifting. Just fun and great for dancing, creating or big conversations.”

“When I picked this up today I was told it would keep me energized and feeling good." Did not disappoint- I have been nonstop cleaning my house all day while bonked tf out. Wish I knew about this strain when I was working retail.”"
“I love this strain! I've had it several times, and always enjoyed it! It has a strong pine smell to it. It just puts you in a great, happy headspace!”
“this shit makes me so confident. i feel almost connected with a divine force when i smoke this. my third eye feels OPEN”
“my fav morning weed.”
“Jack Herer is one of my personal favourite strains. I would highley recommend it for day smokers”

“Pretty good strain for daytime use. I didn’t feel hazed or anything a few hours later like I usually do with most strains so that was pretty good. It made me talkative and energetic, motivated. Also made me creative. I don’t necessarily like the smell but it’s definitely one of my top favorite strains.”
“It’s goo, but makes me extra hungry!!”
“how I feel is exactly what is described here. Lots of energy and hungry, very happy and stress-free.”

“Jack Herer is Old Skool.
 It harkens back to the Amsterdam heydays of the 90's.

This strain is not often properly grown, and gets a bad rap, like Green Crack and Maui.

It takes love, and a LOT of light to make a precious Sativa do its work.

God, damn Indica to Hell, Indicas - are  Hemp!”
“Great for daytime use, when you need to be upbeat and creative”
“its a sexy strain mannnn”
“For sure not sleepy. Be prepared to laugh. Be prepared to cough. Hands down an amazing strain. CALI KUSH >>”

“This is a great strain. 
Never disappointed. So keep it flowering.”
“Ok”
“The best. Easy growing, super frosty buds. Love the Jack.”
“Very clear-headed experience. Very alert- blueberry flavor for sure. I feel very energetic, but not hyper if that makes sense. Still relaxed, but totally mentally present.”
“I've only smoked the wax pens version but it's amazing for morning and afternoon. Not before bed.”
“Not the best sativa I have smoked but it’s great for gaming”

“Medithrive 
Adult use 
Great concentrate makes the days work”
“Good pick me up. Good for socialization.”

“Truly a landmark classic, Jack Herer is a wonderful sativa. One of the most uniquely aromatic strains, with pine, diesel, and floral notes which foreshadow its taste upon exhale. Purchased this flower from Harvest of Scottsdale, looks like the buds have been nearly rolled in kief! Quite invigorating to smoke, both in mind and body. General exuberance follows, leaving the patient uplifted for creativity and mindfulnes...”
“Good head high, relaxing, good taste.”
“I had a wax pen with this strain and immediately noticed the earthy and pine flavors. I felt my anxiety slip away and was in a fantastic mood for the rest of the night.”

“This weed made me super energetic but relaxed at the same time (if that makes sense lol). This weed, unlike most weed, doesn’t leave you feeling groggy on your come down, it leaves you feeling refreshed and relaxed. One of the best Sativa’s i’ve had by far. be safe and have fun!!!!”

“Best high of my life. After taking a few hits, and not being very satisfied. I was soon hit with a thc uppercut. I was shot into another universe entirely. I was mind fucked for about 15 minutes, but after that very comfortable, yet functional high. Great for social situations, and other activities. At the end for me I was a little sleepy in my opinion definitely more of a hybrid than sativa. Amazing strain worthy of...”

“It should be called called captain munch! The amount of food I bought from restaurants all in one night is insane. Thai, pizza, and burger restaurants were the three most over priced places around. I woke up the next day, checking my bank account and sure enough, I managed to spend a total of 343$ on food. I stood up from my bed and my stomach felt like I had stuffed a whole turkey down my throat. All of this happene...”
“Really strong sativa.  Great day strain.”

“Finally got a few grams of this classic sativa. I'm usually a fan of hazes, as oppossd to many new sorts of turbocharged sativas, as those make me paranoid. This one doesn't do that luckily, but I did get a lot of energy and cool visuals. A little bit of downside is the jumpiness you get with higher doses. Everything outside looks literally awesome, like a painting. Typing is troublesome, lines are double like 3D scr...”
“Everyone likes Jack Herer.  Your typical everyday Sativa?  Not so.  Give it a try and you’ll see why.   You know why I like Jack?  Cause when everything else fails Jack will be there for you.”

“My experience with this strain is through an oil cartridge. If you’re looking for a strain to help give you a sharp focused energy then i highly recommend Jack Herer. Great for going to work or class.”
“The best I feel like I’m floating but yet relaxed.  Love it.”
“felt uplifting and focused. Helped get stuff done”
“This shit smacks”

“This is a great strain for me. I can smoke it when I'm a bit sleepy and want to have some regenerated energy, yet it doesn't make me too hyper or anxious like some others do. I felt that the taste was pretty generic honestly, but I've never been the best at describing strain tastes unless they stick out considerably to me. Makes me feel pretty uplifted mood-wise and it's not harsh on the lungs. I also noticed it help...”
“Good. Mild Sativa, a little jittery but def has energy. Good for depression.”
“5/10 nope”
“This strain does everything I look for in a sativa. It's very uplifting, keeps you focused, you're extremely happy and your eyes feel very heavy. Smells fruity, tastes earthy. A really good strain.”

“I absolutely love this strain, enough to take the damn time to write a review of it. I am the survivor of a Traumatic Brain Injury and have been utilizing medicinal cannabis for over 20 years. I am a proud burner badgewearer and stoner of stoners while never being stoned because I have had an injury. This particular Sativa strain that I purchased from Green Cross Cannabis is only 18% and it is packing just what it ne...”

“This is what I call “clean your house” strain. This makes me get stuff done, lots of energy and willingness to want to complete tasks I put off. One of my top strains that I always keep on hand - highly recommend for everyone!”
“Piney peppery smell. Draw is thin-mint cookie. Earthy and chocolatey. Effects were cerebral and focused”
“Really nice on muscle spasms”

“My go to daytime smoke! Instantly puts a smile on my face and it really does get me motivated to be creative.  Great for doing art, going for a swim, snow boarding, reading,nature hikes etc A+ strain!”

“So far it's my number one strain as far as a must have to help me get through a day of hard work. My fatigue and anxiety diminish
and my head stays clear enough for me to solve problems.”
“Really helps with anxiety and panic attacks.”
“No munchie strain to try”
“My number 1 to go to 🔥🔥 this strain gets me chill and ready to go on with my day. More of a head high and I’m able to do what I got to do!”
“like the feeling of a night with close family and friends around the fire"  -Dr.Haze”"
“Jack my boy over here is a savior. He gives me the confidence of a beast. I feel like I can do anything.”
“Instantly put me in a good mood upon the first hit. Felt energetic, happy, and upbeat.”
“Puts me in focus when it’s time to work.”

“Tried Jack Herer for the first time recently. Absolutely amazing feeling after smoking. It doesn't make you dopey and dumb. For me, I felt happy, attentive and in the moment. Definitely would be good for before work or school. Keeps you centered, perhaps a little bit floaty.”

“I found Jack HERER about 3 months ago and now it's possibly my favorite strain. I suffer from chronic pain and this gets my head in a nice euohoric high that I can really function using it. I love it really anytime. if I'm vaping it in the evening i usually mix it with something that has high insomnia help, then its the best of both worlds. I've even made a great tincture with Jack and ACDC. Excellent results. Jack i...”

“As far as Sativa's go, this is the one that gives me the most of what I might expect from one.  Comes with a kick, so most positive experiences come from switching off to another kind after a hit or two.  

Also Rocket Fuel when tired.”

“It wasn’t a very strong high for me, but that is made up for by the complete obliteration of anxiety. One of my favorite if I’m in a down or stressed mood. Great for daytime use, before work, really any situation.”

“got some renouer (Jack herer Strain) from SQDC in Quebec where marijuana is now legal. wow , the best strain ever . I'm usually paranoid using MaryJ but this strain really made me relax , laugh and enjoy the moment .”
“WOW! This is a must!!!!! I’m to high to say anything else ✌️”
“Best tasting strain of concentrate I've ever had. The strain just has a bland mediocre high though. Every one should at least try this strain once, you won't regret it.”
“first try today. nice buzz but able to think clearly.   new user.  I have tried strawberry cough and tangie.  so far jack is the fav.”
“This strain has a nice peppermint taste! It’s a nice head high that isn’t too much!”

“These were some of the prettiest buds I have ever seen! They were incredibly frosty and had bright orange hairs throughout. The taste was a bit peppery, along with the smell. Sniffing this almost made me want to sneeze. It provided a very nice uplifting and energetic feeling that lasted well into my day.”
“Great for daytime and not bad before writing music. Good tasting and long lasting in the vaporizer.”

“I am a regular consumer of this great medicine. Today was my first time trying jack heren and Its some good stuff man. You can feel a sense of relaxation take over your body by the time you inhale your second hit while also experiencing a solid head buzz. I also love the popcorn sized nugs instead of big ones with a lot of stem. Good taste as well and not harsh!”
“Energy Booster, buddy feel like flying. Cant sit still in class lol”
“An amazing pick that's for sure.”
“Man this jack never gets old, cracker jack was nicely done . Over all you just can't go wrong with this, its a sativa and I just barely get enuff body high to keep me lifted,..”

“Nice hint of fruit on exhale. Smells great. Smokes very smooth. I felt very energetic and happy. I felt aware of everything. With concentration, I could carry on a conversation and do things. After the mind high dies down you get a light body high so you can drift to sleep.”

“Hotboxed with this strain :D Laughing definitely occurs as you start out but then things totally mellow out. The nugs were covered in crystals and orange hairs and had a dried up leaf kind of color. This shit's hard hitting out of a joint but it's pretty smooth with a pipe. After taking a few hits of this, I noticed that it has a bitter citrus type of flavor. A very light paranoia might creep up on you but it complet...”
“Great feel... always making feel creative and inspired to share life!”
“Bad taste... nice high!”
“the best”
“It was amazing but i was feeling so anxious and paranoid after a while but it was an amazing high other than that”
“awesome sativa”

“I've had a few samples of J1 now, from a few different collectives, and I gotta say, its just a really nice, well-balanced strain.  Known for its spicy characteristics, a well-grown JackHerer bud will carry a flavor all its own.  A perfect bud for a nice two to three bowl sesh when you aren't quite ready to clock out" mentally for the day just yet.  Certainly not the type of weed to knock your socks off
column4: just a swee...”"

column3: “Good flower I love it”

“I've been smoking this for the past two days- for the first time, actually. It's certainly lived up to its reputation. One of my new all-time favorites. Looking forward to vaping this, which is my usual method of consumption.”
“Wow what a great strain, spicy flavors, and buds so thick you wouldn't think it were a sativa, highly recommended”
“Really good stuff. Great to just chill and feel totally relaxed, with friends or by yourself.”
“Simple smoke bout it”
“Some top notch fire here, if you've got the real deal. I recommend it,”
“Wonderful way to roll out of bed and get the day started”
“such a cool different taste to it”
“whoa”

“An awesome example of one of my all time favorite strains! Extremely heady just plain makes you feel great about everything. Very euphoric and a good push to the creative drive, I love using it when making music. Perfect for any time of day as it will energize in the morning, uplift in the afternoon or just put you in a good mood for the evenings. Has it's own unique taste and smell, I tried my best to profile it but...”
“two words : Five stars. amazing strain with hard, earthy taste...”

“This was my first time with this strain. When I opened the bag I thought I was suddenly on a camping trip. It smelled like a Christmas tree , the order was earthy and strong. A whiff of skunk soon followed to convince my olfactory system that I had not been ripped off. The dry , yet spongy texture was almost white from the THC frosty goodness. Breaking the bud into my pipe was a pleasant experience as it released mor...”
“I must say I love this strain. At first hit It was a good slap in the face but has a wonderful creative vibe to it.”
“Very high heady"!”"
“smooth and not pungent but the high" effect on me didn't last too long. used about 4-6 times but still disappointed with the effect on me. will not purchase again.”"
“A good uplifting high, you can feel the dominant sativa, but the indica hits for a good full body and mental high.”
“love this strain when its grown right!”

“dude. just, duuuuuude. 29.3% thc from my LP at tilray. one bowl, just 1 mofuckin bowl, and im a spacecase haha (im quite seasoned with high tolerence) when u get like this man its just like, whoa. duuude. pain is going away, happiness is coming in, and i am at one with the world.”

“Solid sativa, gave me an upbeat energetic high that helped me focus on preparing for next season. Got some game film in and even threw some routes with my receivers. The farm was GrowOp Farms, great packaging and really beautiful flower. Go Hawks”
“OUTSTANDING !!!!”
“clear headed nice feel relaxing.....”
“This is a great strain for starting the day. It really is like a jolt to get you going. It's very peppery and harsh as a bud smoke. Also cranks your appetite up to 11!”
“Wonderful uplifting high, thoroughly enjoyed playing Go-Fish after smoking.”
“effective medicine, tastes great too !”
“This strain was insane!! One of my top 3's for sure... I'm a sativa person and this was perfect! I vaped it and tripped hard and had energy”
“Great bud! Smooth, quick results, good sativa head change!”
“It's difficult not giving this strain a full five.... gotta love the Sativa dominant strains!”
“This seems more Indicia too me! I hate Sativa bc of anxiety and love this strain. A+”
“One of my fav strains...and depending on the batch, can be downright orgasmic!”
“A nice kick in the ass. Not too strong, but def has the same effect on me as a shot of espresso. It can sometimes make me irritable if I'm somewhere loud or too crowded. Great for doing the dishes.”
“surprising flavor, nice uplifting buzz”
“While not normally a Sativa fan, I find that while I do not feel 'energized' or 'awake' on this strain, I DO feel creative, happy, peaceful and blissful.”
“I love it. hands down the best sativa out there!!!it's that cool,smooth,clear headed high that keeps you coming back for more.if you haven't tried it yet your missing out.”
“I dig it!”
“Its strong. I can't drive when I smoke this because it fucks me up! Pretty good high.”
“Next day high...smoked a joint last night and still feeling it in the morning. Super resin goops in the roach.”
“It had a greet high”

“Perfect strain for daytime use. I vaporize using a pax 2 & love the pine/mint flavors that I get from Jack H. The high is definitely a quick on setting & heady/sativa high in effects. I feel energized, sociable, uplifted with an arousing creative mental euphoria. Listening to music, doing house chores/running errands, hanging out with friends watching sports or enjoying a day outdoors are all enhanced with Jack H. If...”
“This is one that awakens you - and puts you on your ass at the same time" I have been waiting for a review like this. Very few words but just enough to describe this beautiful herb.”"
“if u come across the right batch this stuff is really great and tends to have a decent taste. the high doesn't last very long but when its there its there.”

“the only reason I made this Leafly account is to say that Jack Herer is the best I've ever smoked.

I don't care about kush or haze or whatever that's just pot.”
“It made me a little paranoid, no munchies, relaxed muscles!! gave me a head and body high.”
“a Clean nice Sativa, pine taste, very good for the morning.. dont do it at night”
“This strain will get you very high!”
“wow this stain is anamzing to the point that I was still high as hell the next morning, I highly recommend this stain”
“I was expecting a less sleepy high than what I got.”

“Taste is skunky, buds are not dense, not heavy on the eyes, high is light-moderate and calms body, not harsh, good hybrid for beginners, good social smoke, does not overwhelm the senses, it would make a good commercial strain for the general public . It should be categorized though as a hybrid rather than a sativa.  As a hybrid it's okay but I wouldn't purchase it again anytime soon as I prefer something more memorab...”
“A great strain to smoke in the morning. Great for going out with friends, being creative, and even studying (for myself at least).”
“Although my bud was only 11-13% this stuff got me good and high, got sucked into surfing the web. Nice relaxing strain with sativa vibes.”

“This is a reliable strain for me.
 Smooth mellow buzz that doesn't put me to sleep, but eases muscle tension.”
“loved it!!”

“Considering I'm in a virtual desert when it comes to strain availability, I was glad to recently find Jack at Sacred Garden in Santa Fe. 
Can't say it was the same effects as I remember in the distant past, but definitely not the evil couch lock of some other strains I have gotten more recently.  
I think I missed the creative, energetic effects I remember and some are saying they got.  It did help the pain some (not...”
“Great high just short lived”

“4.5/5  Won't give my delibrations until the nExt morning... just a quick notE to reminD myself that; eating 'connoIsseur kangaroo iSland honey with piStachio' Ice cream stiCks is by far the best snacK you have choosen to eat. sincerly, me.

~~~~~finiSh ThE rIdDlE~~~~~~

Righto so ^that was written while high... I will now review it sober haha;

One of the best highs I can remember having. It's clear headed effects ar...”
“Love how I this strain gives me room in my high for focus and motivation, or rest if that's what I want. Doesn't make me sleepy at all, just relaxed.”

“It has everything I could ask for.  A nice Sativa impact for a euphoric relief for anxiety, a very pleasant body buzz that relieves pain.  Great in a social environment and comfortable to smoke alone.  This is at the very top of my list for any strain.”
“hands down amazing sativa .... smooth and very energizing.”
“fire”
“probably the best stuff i've ever smoked haha”
“Great for anxiety/depression. Strong line taste...sort of Pinesol honestly. Overall sense of well-being and relaxed but energetic high. Good for during the day. Slight headache occasionally though.”
“Very nice classic smell, taste, and high.  This strain is like looking at an old photo and the nostalgia it brings back.”
“my top favorite stran of all time”
“Awesome stuff, would recommend it to anybody, and the customer service was superb!”
“Creative, happy, and energetic. Walking in the snow is pretty cool.”
“This has become one of my favorites. I enjoy the feeling you get. It also has a smoother taste.”
“very happy laughing high^^ in my opinion better than strains like lemon haze or super skunk because you got sativa AND indica feelings”

“probably my favorite of all time. if you need to show anyone what fire bud looks like and should be like, this is what you break down and roll up, after a nice LOOOONG inhale of its intoxicating skunky aroma.”
“Wonderful strain.  Excellent - smells beautiful too.”

“I really like this strain for pain relief and energy. I have RA, and it's hard to function during a regular day. The Herer really helps me function.
For those with sensory issues, please note:
 My son tried this strain and it gave him an hour long sensory storm" where everything is too loud
column4: too bright
column5: too soft
column6: too hard
column7: too everything. He's 21 but it was like he was an 8 year old wanting to escape it all again. C...”"

column3: “Great for getting my day started, one of my favorite Sativas. Definitely kick starts my creativity too!”
“great for wake and bake . helps get you day going with a kick start for sure”
“allergic”
“Wonderful!!!!”
“One of the best”
“Works really well for my anxiety. I feel energetic, relaxed, and focused. It blocks out stressful thoughts really well. One  of my favorites.”
“Great flavor love the smell. It's one of my favorite strains to smoke during the morning after coffee.”

“Yes, oh yes, I ran into this strain again and Jack never disappoints. I wish I could add a photo of the dense bud I got. It's great no matter how you choose to consume it - joint, bong, vape pen, or blunt.  In the my vape pen Jack goes quickly to the head and hangs out for about 4 hours or better, depending on how much you consume. WARNING:  You will get the munchies so have fruits and snacks on hand.”
“I found my batch to be a creeper". Ya burn one and you burn another one in about 5 minutes
column4: halfway through the second hit your like oh
column5: damn.”"

column3:
“The incredibly clean and pungent flavor for every puff of this medical strain, is amazing. This strain is soothing while feeling uplifted, aware
and positive.”
“Not a bad sativa, but I've like more. It was nice and uplifting but not the head creative high that I like from my sativas. People love it, but I didn't.”
“One of my favourite daytime strains.  Great for productivity, completing mundane chores, with creative bursts along the way.  Always better with a few friends.”
“I like this one, not too strong of a high. Very focused and energetic.”

“This is a really good strain. A buddy of mine got about 3.5gs of it and he shared a blunt with me. I love the feeling. I was relaxed, talkative, and my thoughts were so clear and expanding. Wish I had more”

“Me and my boyfriend gave this strain a try last night, and it turned out to be a really great high. It's definitely more of a head high than body, but it's a nice mix of the two. It's not to heavy on the body, relaxed but not sleepy or lazy. I have ADHD and my boyfriend suffers from depression, so we usually are for head highs to ease the mind a little, and heck here was a bullseye. We laughed, talked and were very a...”
“Great for morning time for a nice antidepressant.”
“this is my all time favorite strain...the master new his stuff”
“This is a wonderful daytime brew"  ... alert and focused while at same time relaxed ...  appreciate the time staff takes educating me..”"

“My favorite sativa dominant strain. Delivers a jolting cerebral buzz and due to its uplifting nature you can toke this all day without feeling drowsy in the aftermath. Would highly recommend for smokers who enjoy getting as high as possible without the sleepy/sedative/hunger inducing effects of other strains.”
“Jack's got your back! One of my favourites, packs a real punch and can take a while to get going the next day after a heavier session,  perfect for the weekends!”
“I really enjoyed this strain! Very nice body buzz and very uplifting head high. Very good herb and I Recommend it to anyone looking for a nice uplifting stone.”
“this had me up and talking”

“Hits well and right in the head. Creativity boost, very functional mood impo, uplifted, analytical, curious, talkative. 
Physically - face and hands, pleasant electrical tickling.
One of my favorites!”
“I hear all the hype and I just dont get it. Smells like kitchen cleaner or pine sol.  Racy high.  Ill stick to my kushes.”
“this great dope  joins our expectation .....the champagne of the sativas. uplifted and talkative effects long lasting pleasure.”

“This strain is instantly energizing. I smoked some of this and cleaned my whole apartment. Really focused me up but very relaxing at the same time. Tingly body buzz that lasts hours. Very potent strain.”
“one of my favorite personal strains. very energized with a strong long-lasting buzz”
“Wakes me up from any level of sleepiness! Good for being productive! Or just getting into the zone and focusing on something.”

“This stuff is a strait up sativa buzz that was purely cerebral. At one point I had a panic attack from this bud and had to sit down for a while. Definitly some of the strongest bud i have ever smoked if grown well.”

“Jack Herer is quite nice. It starts with a bit of dizziness and a wonderful tingly feeling and goes to a nice energetic euphoria with psychedelic aspects but little paranoia. Highly recommended, one of my faves.”
“Sleep educed.”
“Really great bud.  Smells awesome, and is pretty potent.  The best smelling bud ive had. Makes you very lazy and sleepy though.  Its a smoke, and watch 15 movies kinda weed”

“First test 5/19/12
Slight anxiety at first, quick buzz, back pain was more severe when buzz was gone.”
“Decent sativa strain; uplifting buzz that is strong but not overpowering. Breaks up leafy & has a smooth taste/smoke.”

“This is a fantastic herb for the functional & creative person. 

I am a natural bodybuilder and this helps me with focus, energy and pump during training.

It also assists me with my digestive problems better than any other strain.”

“Just picked this up ... Fairly quick head after vaping, giving me some pressure in my head... like a headache, but not quite. Great vapor flavor. 
This is supposed to provide mental clarity, sharp focus, etc.

We will see if it does.”
“not fan of sativa's but well worth the money”
“Highly recommended for before-sunset hours.”
“one of my favorite strains. smells like sweet tea or lemonade or some shit like that...awesome buzz and amazing taste. very happy, relaxed, high. good shit.”
“Awesome high great head high on my top 10”
“jack is a really nice sativa. great for mornings”
“i liked it”

“The smell of this strain reminds me of the soft plastic fishing lure worms that I used growing up.  It tastes a little odd, kind of artificial but at the same time earthy (kind of like a car air freshener).”
“Love it! kindest meds I've seen in a while. Makes me feel like Doug Benson is inside my head squeezing my eyeballs.”

“This Jack Herer smelled so good I was already done with my purchase and decided to get a little more once I opened the sample jar. Its got that smell that for some reason smells ,for lack of a better explanation, similar to cat pee. Headband smells the same often. This  bud I got ended up being a little airy or larfy" but it was still excellent. I would get it again. Great strain for pain.”"
“Very nice taste great for daytime.”

“This strain is hands down my favorite, and easily stands out amongst other high quality strains, such as Blue Dream, Sour Diesel, and assorted others that I have used. The high is near perfect, with the ideal mix of sillyness and heightened mental capacity, as well as a soothing, yet energizing body high. Truly an all star amongst strains, and I highly recommend it to anyone for both Daytime and nighttime use.”
“my gosh! sooo enjoyable and long lasting. made everything wonderful and fun but still could rationalize and function normally”

“Instant happiness. There's not much more to say other then smoking Jack Herer was happiness in a bud form. It definitely has a strong pine/earth smell which is very pleasant. I am a pot smoker 100%. In rare occasions do I consume edible cannabis so everything I say and recommend is personal preference. So I recommend a pipe and chillum and not a one hitter or bong. On a different side note, I wish under the category,...”
“Vape jelly by Royal Concentrates”
“really great sativa! great euphoria and energy. one of my all time favorites.”
“My friends and I are currently smoking this. It is straight up amazing. Heady high, plenty of giggles and laughter.”
“Picked up an 1/8th of this great strain but sometimes the high can be a little intense and after smoking a few bowls you will either feel great or so dizzy you need to lay down.”
“One of my first weeds ever smoking, and it gives the best all around high, perfect for those mid day smoke sessions or those late night ones.”
“Possibly the world's most perfect sativa.”

“This is one of my favorite strains ever. I love medicating with this stain in the day time as it promotes a cerebral and creative high! The flower smells of citrus and the taste is smooth. A great day time smoke or one to get the creative juices flowing!”
“This was the first weed I ever purchased. It was dank and made me hungry. Good, solid weed.”
“Really love Jack, you get really high without any paranoïa.”
“This bud is the best. It helps keep my mood happy. I feel so chilling after smoking it.”

“A very intense cerebral high that lasts a good couple of hours. It ended up knocking me out and I slept like a baby for a good three hours but this was due to me smoking too much at once. Would definitely smoke this again!”
“Pretty mellowing but was expecting more creativity and energy. Good for watching a decent movie where you want to be alert”
“I LOVE this strain! Its the best sativa I have ever tried! I love the high from it! I feel so creative and I'm in such a good mood when I smoke it. Its amazing!!”

“I personalty love J.H its a on the the go head high, that will not get you so stoned that you can not walk and talk and remember to feed the dog (dogs like food y'all did ya know that? well shit son now you do) its a citrus meets tea leaf (light tea think pear tea or white tea.do not know what that shit is? well go take your happy ass to the nearest  grocery store and buy some ya primitive) Jack here has never made m...”

“This strain gave me one of my bests highs ever, it was a comfortable and super energetic high, also I laughded alot.
It deserves the 5 stars🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁”
“Nice earthy taste. Leaves u relaxed for a good 2 hrs.”
“Sweet smell, colorful buds. relaxing high. good spliff pot.”
“I thought it's the best I've had so far !!”

“This strain was surprising.  For the low THC content it really kicked after a few minutes and keep kicking after a few hours.  It is a very impressive strain I would suggest to smoke in subtle amounts”

“I smoked a joint with a few buddy's then took one moderate sized bong toke and I was tripping out. I was hallucinating but in a good way. It gave me a very chill vibe for a sativa and I was able to go to bed when I wanted. Great strain!!”
“I love this strain. it's very laid back like the Dude". It does not mess my head up
column4: More of a focused view. it can be Harvey dutie high :)”"

column3: “This is the most amazing Sativa I have ever smoked.  It hits hard and it hits fast with a strong cerebral buzz that will have you thinking about Plato's Republic or the creation of the universe.  This strain is the Thinking Man's" strain
column4: in that it really expands your mind and gets the creative juices flowing again.  If you have a high IQ and you love to think about lofty ideas
column5: then this Jack Herer Sativa is for y...”"

column3: “Great strain. Perfect after work smoke. Nice high and can still be functional.”
“smoked a Gram and I was off to school best mist none paranoid high I have ever had and its just so uplifting wish that I just got more of it”
“doesn't have the best taste but gets you high and hungry!”
“good sativa, great high A”
“Purchased some at Greener Grasses in Woodlawn neighborhood. Enjoyed it immensely buds were well trimmed and prices were good.Store was clean and well stocked will definitely return”
“taste good smells good burns good, all around great sativa”
“great strain, i really enjoyed it”
“This made me so energetic. I could do anything. I would really liked this sativa mostly from the body feeling.”
“It was a good hi monent and good munchies but the all creative part was missing”
“Nice Sativa . Energetic and uplifting . Short peak though , definitely wished the high stayed strong a bit longer . Vaped a BHO version of this strain . All in all its ight.”

“Very soothing massage like feeling in the back sides of my head. Current energy level is slightly elevated. Very tasty smoke. Hints of chemical on the tongue after exhale from glass pipe. One of my top 3 strains for medicating ADHD. Calm and focused on task at hand. Appetite induction is mild.”
“I can pronounce Herer, just Jack”

“Sin duda un clásico, una Sativa que hay que probar. Un sabor muy rico con un pegue impresionante, muy fuerte, muy rapido, bien Sativa, nada de quedarse dormido. Una cepa para repetir y volver a testear.”

“STAY ON TARGET, LUKE

I am more into fruity strains. But this makes you so focussed with a clear and creativ mind. I wrote two concepts in a night. 

My five cups of esspresso”
“today's work went quite smooth dew to Jack. I had the uplifted energetic High i was seeking with with a clear-head to accomplish my work.”
“very chill. my mind is active but not overly high. pretty happy and stress free”

“Jack is my new nickname. I can use this either before writing or while tracking guitar. Focused. Inspiring. No matter what J.H. has got me covered for each productive  day this week, and just.. for the rest of the year.”
“A clear-headed up beat high! Great for dancing, socializing with friends or a night out. I sometimes get a little anxious when high and I have never felt that way on Jack. A+”
“Don't usually buy sativa but this was a lovely smoke and I'd definately buy it again.!”
“pretty mellow”
“First time smoking very warm feeling and melted stress and depression away pot is awesome!”
“Mellow, able to function and be productive with minimal head cloudiness and improved mood and anxiety.”

“I've made use of this strain during the day a few times, and I get headachey each time. Not A+ considering I'm trying to avoid headaches in the first place. That said, is a really good balance between a cerebral high and a body high. For someone who doesn't struggle with headaches as much, I would recommend!”

“I was trying a couple different sativa strains to mix with my regular strains. This was one of them. I was not terribly impressed with the blend or straight. The head change definitely is a creeper but does not last long.”

“very dense buds, I was very happy with this strain, as soon as I put The first bud into My grinder I could smell Its  throughout  The house, very very potent. and as for high and smoothNess I have encountered no others like it, definitely one of a kind and highly highly reccommendable”
“Love me some Jack. Helps me write and get things done!”
“Love it! Put me in a creative mind set to do so me art.”
“great super high very uplifting and energetic for me.”
“Made me super paranoid and quiet...wasn't worth the hype.”

“Jack is nice, I really like him. He kicked my migraine out after two tugs on a cartridge. I hate that he pulls me down a little before he brings me back up because sometimes it is hard to get past the initial down. Other than that, Jack was good to me for an entire month.”

“I haven't had Jack Herer in nearly two weeks now. I've been wondering why I've been so lethargic lately and less than 2 minutes after taking this medicine, I'm feeling more energetic and alert.  I recommend one hit in the morning to get the day started. It works great for getting your mind up and running quickly.”
“This is my go-to, house strain. Effects are very energetic, creative, and talkative. Clear-headed high, almost no body effects; doesn't slow you down.  Great for wake n' bake and day smoking.”

“Was told this was one of the happiest strains. not gonna say if you smoke this you'll be happy, that's all dependent on external circumstances, buttt this and blue dream did make me laugh at stupid things, and Idk about my gf, but overall pretty bubbly and carefree :) don't smoke this to be happy, but definitely makes life a little brighter :)”

“Jack Herer is my favorite strain. It keeps me productive leaving me with the clearest perspective where you can direct your own high. I would not characterize it as strong or weak, but rather I say it's The Chameleon Strain" of the Cannabis world. This Lemon Pledge tasted nor smelled like something we encountered before. It can be likened to something akin to the relationship between Aventus and Lomani AB Silver whe...”"

“Had this strain as a sugar wax extract from bhomb squad extracts courtesy of emerald avenue. Absolutely amazing flavor. Very smooth, very sweet pine with earthyl notes. 3 dabs and I'm on cloud 9. Very euphoric, cerebral effects. Uplifting”
“Jack + RadGrrl 4eva 👫”
“Jack + RadGrrl 4eva 😙”
“very defined head high. heavy eyes. for sure a creeper, and a little goes a long way.”

“Wow, this one hits fast! Just a few draws, and I was really feeling it. Some strains sneak up on you over time, this one smacks you on the top of the head. 

It truly does feel different than other strains. I've tried Indicas and Hybrids, each having their own feel"
column4: but I really like this one for just feeling... good.

column1: The crazy part for me was that it was so cheap at my local dispensary. At $10/g for me

column3: “I love the energy it gives me, I also really enjoy any offsprings of this like J1, Emerald Jack.  My #2 favorite sativa.”

“almost as good as chocolope, with a little more emphasis on energetic and less on euphoric. this would be great for camping or for a day full of a number of boring errands. gave me the ability of focus and took away my usual agitation. not much for pain but my head feels fine”
“Just relaxed and happy. Sweet flavor on vape.”

“I have been smoking on this strain for several years. Very uplifting, cerebral high that gives you the energy to do about anything. Creative, social smoke. Can;t say enough good things about it.  5 star smoke.”

“i was using it for my anxoety. it knocked it out after 2 puffs. I never felt so focus and relieved in a long time. it also got me to draw again.
thanks jack!”

“Good daytime strain! Surprisingly potent for a sativa, with an uplifting, head-clearing type of high that helped me focus. Lost a bit of its punch after a few days, but a good writing strain for sure. Thanks for the great meds @ AZ Organix!!”

“don't smoke more than a bowl. I was playing counter strike and decided to light up another bowl and that's when things kinda got weird. I just blanked out of everything and just didn't know what was happening in life itself. I thought 2 cans of raviolis would fix the issue but it took me 20 minutes just to get that done because I had decided that while I was trying to dump the raviolis out that it would be a great ti...”

“This is one of the best strains I use to help with my depression, after smoking one bowl I felt extremely happy and in a productive mood within 5 minutes, I also had a warm relaxed body high a kind of buzzy" feeling that you get with hazes. The only problem is that the high doesn't last that long
column4: one bowl only gave me about 30 minutes of feeling great
column5: but I had no problem loading another bowl and getting back to c...”"

column3: “This is one my top 3 strains of all time. Medicating with Jack Herer always feels like a happy home. This medicine can do no wrong. It provides quick and immediate relief with a lengthy buzz. I recommend this for anyone with pain or depression that wants to stay active and alert-works for me everytime!”

“One of my absolute favorites 
**Recommend**”

“For sure one of my favorite strains even if it does cause me more anxiety in the end. For the time that I am high every thing is great and happy. Very uplifting. For me, very strong sativas usually give me bad anxiety on the come down, this one was no different but well worth using it.”

“Made me feel trippier than other strains, kindof more hallucinogenic almost. Some anxiety and paranoia too. After the first few sessions it was no big deal, but an unexpected and different feeling for me!”
“A lively and sweet strain”
“for most of my high I was laughing and happy”
“Great strain. The jack gets me so energic and clear, the feeling is so unique. one of the chillest high's ive been true.”
“I like Jack because of it's potency. It gets you pretty high and makes you feel great. The only side effect I found to be annoying with taking this strain was being dizzy when I stood up.”
“Weak taste but very soft and happy buzz”

“Great clear buzz. Don't know if it's my source but I find it has a heavy come down. Super strong buzz lasts at least 2 hours. It's looks and smells great. Never seen any other strain that's coated in more trics!  Incredible must try.”
“Great Sativa for day time use. I prefer my ovens for the day time with 70 percent JH, 30 percent Blue Dream.”
“Very focused”

“only negative thing i have to say about it that its extremely rare where i live.
smoked it a while ago and had some awesome time with it.
good smell, good taste. makes you so hungry and locks you so damn hard to the couch that you tell the pizza service how to get into your house to deliver it directly to your couch.
makes you creative and gives you nice CEV's.
definately a must try!”
“I enjoyed.  Got it at a great price.  Sticky and stinky it what I like.  Its goes quick.  Looking forward to the next  'jack attack'.”
“I love this bud.  I can smoke when I wake up and I'm not dragging myself all day. This is a true favorite of mine.”

“One of my favorite strains. Great trichome development, along with a pungent smell unique to its name. The buzz is a great euphoric high that's great for almost anything. It sticks with you to. Always a must-have.”

“Day 1: First time smoking a sativa in at least 2 months. Smoked a small bowl that hit me really quickly and lasted quite some time. Great all-around strain.



Highly recommended if you haven't had a sativa in a while, nice change of pace.”
“Very Uplifting & cerebral High”

“An extremely good medicine. Much stronger body high than I originally anticipated but well worth the purchase. The creative juices may begin to flow but do not sit still for too long or things can get a little heavy. It packs a pretty good punch for a sativa. A MUST TRY!”
“Jak dla mnie mega dobra odmiana, nic tylko polecić innym korzystającym z zasobów natury. Ciekawy, leniwy haj na popołudniowe chillowanie ze znajomymi.”

“Jack in it's many uses is like most will say, is a great strain!  I've had this in so many flavors and this bud is for you!  I can still get work done and stay focused and no discomforts.  It hits quickly and lasted me for hours.  You might have to hit this a little more than some but it's still a great choice, you can't go wrong!”
“I had the sensation i was on the moon the first time i tried this, the second time i tried it i was going up againts walls cause the felt like ''Jello''. haha great strain”
“Head high is great one of my new favorites!”

“Right now I'm not quite sure how to explain my high because I am currently slipping out of consciousness... People are talking, I'm not listening... Don't you hate it when people try to type on your keyboard? Those motherfuckers...”
“Probably the best looking Django I have ever smoked, it was so clean and just made everything fine and dandy, highly recommend to try.”
“Rather short lasting for my taste”
“Nice and mellow but potent; buzz comes on quick and strong. Hint of mint rather than pine.”

“You know how rabbits move? That's me after a bowl of this. I'm the fastest most focused man alive but the creative and overall happy feeling my mind gets is what really brings me back. This strain has remained my favorite smell, taste, and high since my younger years of smoking. Just like the rabbits, this piney sativa is bred well, and has no plan to stop! #JackHerer #MyLeaf”
“Good sativa..it keeps me calm and awake.however it has left my eyes too dry.”

“Nice dense buds, strong taste and scent. Nice sociable high inducing lots of laughter and 'weed euphoria'. Great body high too. Left me with pretty bad dry eyes though and felt quite groggy after smoking a lot before bed.”
“The legend himself”
“I love sativa strain not all are that great but jack Herer do the job”
“Very nice strain, very good in bongs. Grinds up well and has a nice high. Good quality weed.”

“OMF, this stuff is a delight, from it citrus-laden aroma, to the most high/up, energetic buzz around.  The more u smoke, the more wound u get.  Needed a good indica to get to sleep, which is exactly how I like it.  Hats off to Captain Jack!”
“Great smoke  tasty and great smell! I really enjoy this strain and i highly recommend it.”
“Smooth strain nice earth flavor, fun high! Would recommend.”

“I was trying this wonderful strain last week in popeye coffeeshop in amsterdam.
It start kind of slow, and then becoming more and more noticeable in the form of sweet euphoria, happiness, and a complete sense of well being.
If you find it, (and its not easy now days), grab it .. and save me some!”
“When I took the first hit I could feel it in my brain all happy and flying it felt like. I would reccomend this is a gnarly strain .”
“Smells amazing, great high.”
“For me this was mostly psychedelic.wound me up too quick!its was ok.”

“Talk about energy! 
This will definitely give you the motivation you need to get through any day. I personally wouldn't recommend doing this before bed , you'll be up cleaning your entire house. ha-ha. 
I definitely will be buying more.”
“overall a good strain. it puts your body and mind at ease. Great for stressful days. the reason I gave it four stars is because it gives me head and eye pressure for about 15mins after smoking.”
“This strain is the bees knees! Great taste, great smell, n great medical benefits. A strain that's truly held its own in the age of a million strains!”
“This Strain Is Everywhere!!! I Love It! Known to balance out the mental and physical effects in hybrids. Jack Herer on its own, a loud aroma accompanied by a smooth high. FG Approved”
“one off the best strain i have taste !”

“Its really tasty, andere very relaxing.”
“Top 5 strain”
