“This strain truly does have many variations! The first time I tried it, very cerebral, uplifting, but a little on the weak side. 

Tried it again two years later and this jack herer felt denser, smelled nice and spicy like its parents, and maintained that gorgeous cerebral effect! This jack herer gave me a very restful sleep and i drifted off tge minute my head hit the pillow. :)”
“Great uplifting ride let's th e creative  juices flow too. if you are an artist or musician I highly recommend JH”
“This so far is my favorite strain. Lightens my moods and great wake and bake. Been pounding the gym out with this strain.. No negatives like paranoia or anxiety like I get from other strains”
“this weed looks excuse my language fucking" awsome”"

“Picked up some jack today that got me jacked" after first couple bowls I had a serious stare down with Mother Earth before realizing I could hear my heart beating :) it kept me super active through the entire high with minimal laziness after words loved it”"
“Really harry dense nugs. Nice woody earthy taste. Doesn't hit that smooth but most really harry nugs don't. Uplifting and happy. Overall great strain.”
“Takes a lot of flower to achieve any sort of medical effect. Kind of worth it if you have a lot of money and time.”

“wow amazing at an 1\8 for 35 PR this is fantastic, nothing but major focus and energy plus a sort of not aware what you are doing but you are doing it subconsciously feeling like I could still drive but not realize when I go to my destination,had such a good workout with this, plus super happiness”
“Amazing High .”

“Hooooly shit. Who cares about anything?! Stress? Nope! Worries? Nope! Space aliens? Nope! Inevitable heat death of the universe? Nope! Got anxiety? This stuff will rub it's nose in the dirt and send it running home to mama. Goddamn...”

“Jack Herer is a well thought out strain. Energetic, creative and funny all rolled into one. I recommend it to anyone that needs an immediate boost in mood or activity. I can only relate to a happy feel good experience. As it is a Sativa (80%) strain, it is not too heavy or body numbing. It is light and easy, as well as pain nullifying. While on it, my pain was dramatically reduced. Loved it! Thanks Jack...RIP!”
“For a sativa it is just lovely”
“At first I thought this Strand was weak. About 15 minutes later it came back around like a boomerang. definitely more focused on this strain then the other sativas. This is in my top 5.”

“Great Strain, Very Good For Hotboxing.
While Hotboxing I Get Low-Key Anxiety & And Bug Out Inside. Very Dense When Breaking It Down. Jack Herer For Me Was On The Hallucination Side When I First Smoked It. You Get Used To It But Never Really Do. My Customers Love It & The Ones I Smoke With Usually Can't Go A Full Round Of Can4Can.”
“Just medicated with this strain. Feeling uplifted. About to wash some dishes.”

“One of my all time favorite sativa strains, def one to wake and bake with! Makes your whole day so fun easy going, and has a positive uplifting effect! When you're just so grateful for what you got and know that everything will be all good!”
“One of my favorites”
“This strain has a very tolerable taste and hits smooth in blunts. The high kicks in fairly quick and is somewhat energizing.”
“very smooth taste and stress killing high. very good stuff”
“Potent strain with a very strong body high. The body high seemed to make me & my friend very tired as apposed to energised”
“I just have to do another review on this strain just to say, It's really good pot.”
“WOW NICE! WAITED TIL THE 420AM SOME AND THINK PROCESS. I MUST SAY THE JACK HERER IS THE FIRE TO START YOUR DAY WITH. TRY IT”
“Has a Very Fresh Taste and a Strong Skunky smell. Very Mellow Buzz and Has a lot of crystals that make this bud very sticky. :)”
“love it  what can i say one of my fav strains love the energy and Euphoric burst #NL”
“This is really good stuff, works well for an all day  flower to smoke. makes my house smell phenomenal.”

“Great strain. One of my top 3 for sure.  Nice clear headed, relaxing high,  able to get stuff done if needed but equally suited to chilling on the couch. One of my favorite things about JH is the euphoria combined with no paranoia whatsoever”

“Great strain! Very strong cerebral high. The effects can be felt within 15 mins or so of smoking. It is a creeper, so take it easy if you have a low tolerance or if you're still figuring out dosage.”
“I used this as a day time strain to help with my arthritis pain. It has a really mellow feel. I'm a new user, so I got a bit of a buzz, but I wasn't stoned. Just relaxed and happy.”

“Not good at low doses, but on high ones it's a good high.

Without properly high dose the effect is such that your mind is very active, but without the desired effect of deep overfocusing. So you end up just thinking annoyingly much, even so that it prevents you from enjoying even a movie or an episode of Animal Planet.

On high dose the effect is more desired one, only with a slight note of distorientation, but whic...”
“great even if low the %”
“My favourite strain for sure! Very uplifting and makes you so happy. But dont smoke this allday, kinda makes you tired".”"

“- Buds smell like honey and spice.
- Tastes Piney and Woody with a hint of Spiced Honey.
- Clear headed, focused, euphoric high.
- Great for afternoons”

“I didn't love it. I searched high and low for this strain and was so excited when it made the rounds at my local dispensaries. Wow, I was disappointed. It was fine. A bit too energetic, but without the focus to be productive. Great for a party and socializing in a micro dose. Very unremarkable. I kept hoping it would get better. Had it in flower form both vaped and in a joint.”
“It's a really fun strain to smoke with fun people. I get really creative and talkative when I smoke it. I also eat like crazy.”

“Was lucky enough to get a pre-roll from The Grow to try and yes this Namesake did not disappoint. Helped to smooth out a bit of anxiety I was feeling, and helped motivate me to get stuff done. Very nice effects.  It was a little harsh to smoke. Definitely would try it again... Great daytime meds!”
“I had to write again about this strain because it's my new go to" medicine. Ive had this strain several different ways. When I smoke it through a bong
column4: I get a slow creepy fog that comes over me in the first 10-20 minutes. It sometimes follows with anxiety
column5: and I have had several anxiety attacks from com-busting this herb. I use cannibis for several ailments
column6: one notable is Anxiety
column7: lol. But I still liked to smoke i...”"

column3: “Pre-legal days, this used to be a frequent option, or at least things called Jack Herer. Pretty much anything with a pine scent seemed to get that label. Tended to be poorly grown outdoor more often than not and as a result the strain got a bad label for causing paranoia. Decided to try some out from my dispensary, and got some exceptionally grown Jack that really changed my mind about this strain altogether. Awesome...”
“Great for the multitasker, not for some1 who is already over active, it will make you have symptoms of ADD, lol. But a wonderful party of the mind and soul uplifter! RIP Jack !”

“I have been vaping some JH rosin over the past month or so, and it tastes absolutely delicious! I'm a hybrid/indica sort of fellow, so it's a bit too heady for my taste. I've found it best to pair it with watching a movie, socializing, or playing video games. Definitely not a nighttime indulgence unless I'm going to be up LATE. 4 stars because it does sometimes give me a mild headache later. Still, very much worth a ...”
“Jack Herer is one of my all time favorites, never and i mean NEVER has it let me down. Great OCD killer.”

“While it is an ok strain, I'm not a fan. The high is ok, it's about what I'd expect from a sativa and overall the actual experience is fine but it doesn't stand out. The reason I dislike the strain is it has an extremely woody aftertaste when smoked. To be completely honest it tasted like bad reggie. And since the experience is only so-so I will be leaving this strain to those that truly enjoy it.”
“it's a reliable sativa strain. definitely a creative experience.”

“Taste 7/10
High 8/10”
“One of the most uplifting sativa's I've smoked this is gas⛽️”
“From Santa Cruz Collective”

“This strain is just great! The frosty buds smell sweet and fruity, almost like a candy. Light, fluffy smoke makes this one of the smoothest hitting, best tasting strains in the world. It is award winning for a reason! King of the sativas!”

“Yes i am writing this after 2 and half hours and i am still high.
+this is my first time smoking in 9 days so as expected, i am still ripped. I encountered no comendable flavor from this herb and at one point i even tasted bluecheese after a hit. my true review will be the test this weekend.”

“Interesting strain. The very first hit packs a powerful punch that made me weak in the knees. It comes on like a rush from the very beginning that is long lasting. Like most people say, it's great for anxiety and stress. However as it comes down, you're left with a rather groggy feeling for the rest of the day. It knocked me out and when I woke up from a 3 hr nap I still felt the grogginess and had a slight headache ...”
“Really smooth hitter. Covered in crystals. Really trippy interesting high.Will recommend it!”
“One of the best highs.. feels more like indica... ive been couch-locked... great though”
“just wow”

“It's been a while since I had a really good quality Sativa. I've mostly been coming across a lot of Kush and   heavy Indica strains. So I was particularly excited when my friend informed me that Jack Herer was circulating through town. At first I didn't really believe it would be top notch Herer, but that morning at 7 a.m. he came over to give me a little sample of his, and boy was it top notch. Immediately after sch...”
“If your not a big fan of Sativas, then id recommend you try this! Very Uplifting and awake. Relaxing as well!”

“Definitely not my favorite. Makes you feel as if you are a little bit tweaked out. You don't really want to sit still. You can for sure function mentally and physically. Not much of a head buzz as much as a body buzz. About halfway through the bowl, I started feeling paranoid as if the police would find me (which is odd because even if they did, I have a medical marijuana card and have WAY under the legal amount). So...”

“Ha, i got used to this strain, im a stress and anxiety guy and i didnt have any issues with this, i cant say i notice it helped, but it definitely did not cause any problems for me, Ive had this too much though and dont enjoy it anymore. I think its just because thats all i had for months and months. Some would say i was lucky, but i like to switch it up and get bored easy, its like if you have pork chops every day f...”
“Jack holds his own as a sativa.”
“smells delicious, sticky, lemony smell.”
“woah. this strand is as close to being it" as ive had.”"
“one of my favourite, awesome freshy taste, always leave me happy as hell,”
“smells like a pine tree and earthy. smooth hit nice high.”
“Definatly one of my top 5 fav strains, gives you such a good high that you feel kind of compelled to actually do stuff”
“Very nice smoke, strong relaxed high”
“Mellow, cerebral high. Good for day use and productivity as well as decreased anxiety and higher sociability.”
“This is most def one of my top5! Once u take a hit of scooby snacks u feel like u just bn scooby smacked lol:-)) its bomb.com”
“Great strain smells woody and tastes spicy, the buds are dark green with brown orange like hairs.  Clear headed creative high great for daytime. I'd recommend it and smoke it again”
“Very enjoyable. Uplifting at first, but will put you to sleep after awhile. Very dry mouth, but a very nice chest and head high.”
“Gave me a kind of short cerebral high. Felt great and floaty/tingly. Good wood/pine taste to go with ita colorful heavy smell 4/5 could be a smidge better”

“A popular strain that just didn't hit the mark. I've smoked Jack Herer twice with minor effects, though the buds were beautiful. Some may get more from this strain than myself, but I would not personally recommend it.”
“Pretty disappointing... the reviews and everything said it made uplifted and energetic. Well this strain put right sleep with a congested feeling my head.”
“Amazing strain. Buds were really pretty and sticky. Tasted very tropical which I enjoyed a lot. Very energetic high.”
“Me ha encantado, un punto paranoico pero agradable, euforica y relajante a la vez”

“Until 4 hours ago, I never smoked JH. If I'm going to be completely honest, heck, before I bought some 6 hours I had no idea this strain ever existed. And as I'm writing this I can tell you hands down my favorite weed ever. 

I suffer from ADHD and both depression and anxiety disorders. This is the first weed that actually stimulated me physically instead of couch locking me when I smoke a large quantity of it.”
“one of my all time favorite Sativa's, it's like my cup of coffee in the morning. A great strain to clear your mind and get stuff done.”
“One of my favorites of all time. A true OG in the bug world!”
“Very clear sativa that allows you to get things done. Perfect for that wake and bake”
“My favorite strain to use before I have to do any work. Gives me tons of energy and focus. I seem to somehow clean my room spotless when I dabout with this strain”
“very nice taste. great steady buzz for 3 hrs.”
“very euphoric, body high”
“Nice strain! It keeps you happy and not a terrible burn out👍🏼”
“The best pain relieving strain.”

“Ah, Jack Herer, one of my favorite day time strains. Doesn't hit too hard which is great for when you don't want to be completely stoned out of your mind but still gives a nice happy head high.

As for taste, nice and earthy. 'Nuff said. This is my go to strain for an afternoon of fun.”
“This is one that awakens you - and sets you on your ass at the same time.”
“Hints of pepper and pine, subtle grapefruit. Straight to the head at first, all the way to the toes after a minute or two.”

“If i had a TV show and I had  to plan tomorrow's episode the whole entire show would be about How and why Jack Herer is the best Cannabis I've ever smoked.  and what sets it apart from all other strains I've had.”
“#Speechless, 2 Full Drags From Needing A Lung Replacement. 3 Blunts A Week Does The Trick, NoLie.com!!!!!! Awesome Strain Mixture!!!!!”
“Class”

“this a pleasantly potent strain that is a mostly cerebral experience with a relaxed calmness that balances you nicely on the edge of outer space.  a wonderful example of a sativa dominant hybrid, with a sweet aroma and beautifully contrasting buds.”

“While my husband absolutely loves Jack as a daytime smoke, I just can't get down. For me there is little benefit unless I smoke a lot and then I'm just brain dead for the day. I tend to feel dumb and lazy but not in a good way.”

“Definitely a great pick! This weed smells so freaking good, and the high follows suit. Super uplifting, a good productivity strain for sure. One of my new favorites! 
The”
“Really good, however be mindful of dosage. It is pretty friking strong.”
“Easy to go. Produces well. Great high!”
“Solid, well rounded, yet potent hi. Mix of heady and body. Musty kind of smell and taste follows suit. Definitely the earthy type.”

“Quick review here. Everyone knows Jack, the wonderful robust musty woody pine taste that over powers your sense with every hit. I got my hands on some shatter made from Jack Herrer buds, it was dark, but the smell and flavor were probably the strongest ive ever come across. column4:

. Definitely two thumbs up!”

Tingling body buzz and uplifting cerebral effects.  Highly recommended for those of you into rosin tech!”
“I'm chilling happy 😊”
“Very strong and hits instantly, but it gets me thinking too much and makes me paranoid.”

“I'm normally not a huge fan of sativa-dominant strains because they make me paranoid, so I was surprised at how well I reacted to Jack Herer.
For me, it's an ideal daytime strain to smoke: it's a happy high" that alleviates anxiety and stress
column4: and is really great for both concentration and socializing. I can focus well on my work (or clean my house and truly enjoy the process)
column5: and generally just feel uplifted and s...”"

column3: “Very smooth tokes with a bit of tang at the exhale. A sweet, fruity-like taste that isn't too overpowering. Mind-boggling and spacing out a little bit will occur, and you can be sure you'll have a nice sativa head high Great quality bud, and this batch had little rock-like nugs that are nice and dense. Overall 4 in my books”

“Its always sunny when Jacks around.  Wonderfully euphoric with a permanent smile.  Just gets up for the day.  A strain is only as good as its grower and of course, the genetics of the plant itself.  Grab some at Nectar if you can.  Call ahead.  Menu changes daily.”

“This is the strain of dreams, I got 5 grams of this stuff and I did not regret it!

This made me very very euphoric and giggly as fuck. I couldn't even keep a straight face for 3 seconds, and If I tried I would just end up bursting laughing for 2 minutes. Such a nice strain to be smoking with friends.”

“I know many people love this strain. I tried it and didn't care for it, but thought I maybe got a poor batch. Tried it again from a different grower and got exactly the same mediocre results.

I hear some like it because it's sativa effects are on the milder side. For me, it was too mild - not much cerebral effects, almost placebo-like for me. After a few more hits, I started to notice a stone creeping up.

The probl...”
“this works well for decompressing from a stressful day, I appreciate the clear-headedness, I think it prevents paranoia really well”
“This is my everyday smoke, It is pure happiness. So great for depression, and I love that it allows me to remain clear-headed. Perfect for daytime! One of my all time favorites.”

“This is without a doubt my favorite strain. I love that Jack does not give you the 'I could eat the table leg if you put peanut butter on it ' kind of munchies. In California, we had many varieties with Jack being the main component and I wish we had the same here in Arizona. Once you try Jack, you'll never go back!”

“One of my favourite strains right now. Gets me moving during the day and that energetic feeling almost creeps up on you. Great for wake and baking and if you're trying to get productive and/or creative, I'd definitely recommended Jack Herer.”
“I like this strain it relaxes my muscuals but dosnt make me tired i like this strain i rexomend it to any one”
“heavy and sharp! Clears your head and gives you energy.”
“Clear headed high very productive and very focused. The come down was very easy and settling”

“A really good staple of the Sativa category. This is a good entry level strain for those new to sativa's or just want a more controlled high that isn't too intense. I like it a lot, but I find it gives me anxiety and headaches, so I tend to smoke small amounts of it and never overdo it.”
“Great for kayaking or hiking, definitely a heady outdoor strain, big fan”
“I like this strain, rebought it about 3 times now, usually I get a happy feeling from the strain, sometimes I just feel really stoned and slow. like you've been leeched by thr seedz :p”

“I remember trying this for the first time and after only a couple puffs I sat the next hour or so at a poetry reading not really registering a whole sentence. High kept creeping up for the first 15 minutes. It was someone else's joint and my friend was almost convinced it was laced. Left an impression. Very resinous. Strong, pleasant high.”

“Really comfy, mellow high. You can totally stay awake with this strain, at least when smoked. A lot of stinging on the intake but a decently thick  cloud on the exhale. Nice, easy transition back down. Good for some depression and anxiety. Not a strong strain at all tho.”
“Very headrush high, giggly, makes eyes look pretty bad in public. Great for walks etc.”
“Great beginner sativa. Effects are all pretty mild.”

“my number one favorite strain. I had it as a hydro. it was the cleanest smoking bud ever. it was so smooth it was like dabbing. what a nice easy introspective highly is my number one bud and the hardest bud I find in nyc”

“amazing simply delicious”

“Love love love Jack Herer! I sometimes just open the bag to smell it, it's so delicious. Very smooth and tasty. It makes me super happy and my troubles go far away. I can be focused if necessary, or just chill. I sometimes find it doesn't help as much for pain, but I don't worry about it when I feel so good. Definitely recommend.”
“This strain gave me exactly what I was looking for! A happy, Euphoric, Giggly, Uplifting, Relaxed high.”

“Makes for the perfect wake and bake. 
Still a favorite of all the strains. (Still a newbie) 
Creative, joyful, relaxing effects. 
Pair it with good TV/Movie/Book or Yoga/Gym or Art/Painting. 
Perfect to keep your mind occupied in a run or any mindless monotonous task for that matter. 
Viva Sativa 🙏🏼”

“I personally don't smoke anymore due to employment constraints, so I'm just a farmer. But the results have been phenomenal!! Took my 1st harvest indoors. Very good returns from smokers!! Nicely heady at first, good body high thereafter. My next go started indoors in the early spring, moving to outdoors in the late spring. Harvested in late October. What came out of my garden was beyond expectations!!!! Not a skunky o...”

“Fantastic strain that has a good mix of uplifting sativa and chilled indica effects. After smoking I was very euphoric- to the point that thinking about happy memories would make me laugh (not giggle) and bliss out. Excellent as a nightcap for anxiety and depression, as the indica in the strain eases you into sleep without knocking you out of the bliss. I adore this strain, if you ever come across it you should defin...”

“I picked up a 1/4 of this the other weekend. I think this strain has potential in the future for dispensaries for customers that want a semi smooth feeling and a fulfilling, comfortable high. When someone smokes this strain, I would hope that they would feel satisfied with their high rather than down and tired like I felt sometimes.”
“Jack hits fast and strong. Immediate feeling of elation and wellbeing . It makes me super creative , but does make it hard for me to concentrate when I am reading. It is very potent so user beware.”
“The strongest, heavy sharp body stoned which made me lazy. Clear , sharp, happy high. I was forgettin stuff i wanted to do..”
“All time favorite strain !”
“gives me headaches”
“One of my favorite sativa strains. That great fruity smell that tastes as good.”
“A nice, clear, happy high that helps me get through the day!”

“Jack knows!

Great daytime med that still allow good functionality.”

“A good Allstar Jack Herer is nice to stay awake. It offers a clear high that I can do homework with, but it does not last long. Tolerance builds fast to it as well.”
“Excelente variedad que hace honor al militante Jack. Una cepa para degustar todo el dia , sentirá una sensacion muy agradable, muy placentera.”

“Best strain I've ever tried. This is the one I've been looking for. I was getting a little fatigued during an afternoon which there was much to do. I had just picked this strain up and since I was getting so tired I might have fallen asleep I felt no harm could be done by pulling out the pipe.

“Definitely my favorite strand, a very strong creeper. Had 3 bowls off of a vapor genie, and didn't feel effects until about 10-15 minutes when it kicked me in the head. “Good strain and usually at a bargain.  The one I got was 70-30 sativa.  What I like about that sat-dom is that it will last for a long time.  For me, it's wasn't ideal as it made me cough too much for my liking.  I have some JH from a year ago and use it as emergency stash.  For those who need for medical purposes, I'd recommend against it.  I gave it a good grade still because smoking alone it made me suffer a great...”

“27/CA. Seriously effective against pain.  A few years ago, I fell 3 stories landing feet first onto cement and sustained many injuries, and Jack makes me feel like I can keep going with my day. Also great in the mornings, and sunny days.

- dry mouth. also for me I get temporary loss of appetite followed by unquenchable hunger hours later.

Forever Jack”

“When I started to write this review I thought to myself What can I say about this strain that hasn't already been said." Well I couldn't think of anything because this strain has it all. The only problem I have is trying to find it all the time.”"

“a nice strain to relax and chill
good if you want to sleep
the high is solid and the taste ist pretty special”
“Awesome strain”

“My favourite strain of all time. I have tried this twice now and both times have been amazing. The most recent time I had some I had a single joint and was stupidly stoned for at least 2 and a half hours.

“Great feeling, the hit came in like a baseball bat to the face. Still amazing effect, good taste,  one of my favorites”

column4: in that it hits all the key areas to evoke a perfect high.”"

“I had no expectations about this strain but oh boy was I wrong. Now I would 100% recommend it, cop it for sure. The body high is mild but not one bit stoned, I don't feel lazy at all, my body just feels light and nice, so after you come down a bit there's no after effects whatsoev...”
“it s great strain with a good smell”

“Jack Herer - I Like!
A cold, snowy February Sunday afternoon.  
Soundtrack: T Bone Burnett, Live Bruce
JH is instantly energizing!  I smoked a medium sized joint out in the cold fresh air.  I stepped back inside, grabbed a pencil and instantly started writing.  But let's back up a bit.  JH is a sativa based hybrid. The buds I received were huge, tight, and a bright green colour with lots of dark hairs woven throughou...”
“a personal favourite due to the medicinal properties of the strain. also has a great flavour and high.”

“Put on some Jimi Hendrix and cleaned the house, did the dishes and the laundry, all with a smile on my face, happy and relaxed. Still had energy for a challenging yoga class an hour after vaping, no burned out" feeling at all. This would be great to take outdoors for a hike or a day at the beach.”"

“It really does smell like Lemon Pledge which I don't find appealing.  It doesn't have any euphoria.  It made me feel slightly more awake and energetic, but it also gave me a headache.  It was okay for nausea, not great though, and I didn't find it worked all that well for pain.  It made me feel a little spaced out, anxious and made my heart beat fast.  Overall, nothing useful.  I won't be using this again.”

“Jack Herer is Great as a crumble 'topper' for a bowl of some particularly tasty Banana Candy, or just about any other strain you might want to 🎶jazz🎵 up a little.  Not my favorite sativa by itself (that would be Super Silver for me btw 😜)”

“Usually my go to is blue dream but, I decided to give jack a try in a vape cartridge. “Haven't smoked in a while. Some strands of sativa can cause a little paranoia, but Jh just felt damn good. Clear headed, feeling good to go with that relaxed body sensation.”

“Great strain! A little hard to type this stuff is so good LOL. Great taste, pretty long lasting high, talkative and euphoric, a great sativa head high, and a tingly body buzz!”

“Nice and uplifting.”

 This one I call the classic Sativa" is great for daytime use

column4: it creeps up on you. It is very easy to get much higher than intended. I personally thus it adds to the charm of this smooth delicious strain.”"

column3: “Love it this strain. First made my arms really tingly but I was very relaxed and easygoing.”

“Really amazingly nice, tingly uplifting sativa with a scent I could never get sick of, very iconic kind of pine weed. The feeling is very energizing physically but also mentally so, very good for releasing tensions.”
“Good for daytime use nice upbeat kind of feel in a Open Vape Pen”
“very nice smoke”
“Really nice sativa strain! Made uplifting and energetic feeling :)”
“Promotes clear headed, creative thoughts and body relaxation.  A well rounded strain for mid-day relaxation.”
“That Jack Herer is here to stay ! If I want to get zooted, this is a top 5 choice. High is level 1 Stoned is level 2 Zooted is level 3.”

“went for a swim on this stuff this morning. easily one of the most productive strains ive ever used. wonderful for socializing and outdoor activity /exercise. but watch out at higher doses. can get pretty stoney pretty fast.”
“Great uplifting feeling - no heavy head like I've heard others say. More dense then fluffy.”
“Well rounded Sativa.  Our pheno has a great terpene profile and is nice and smooth on the old lungs.  Buds are usually a good medium density that cures nicely.”

“Really fruity scent and tasty smoke. Wake n bake with this got you feeling like a 5 hr energy shot. Daytime is a must, but oversmoke might cause headache, not the nappy type of sative like green crack so yeah its not for everyone.”

“Possibly my favorite strain of bud. It's typically ugly to look at, but it has the best sativa-dominant effects you could ask for. Light, floaty, energetic, really strong but still allows you to go about your day, like a secret high that isn't going to blow your cover. Fucking awesome. Tastes piney, goes great with IPAs.”

“Excellent daytime energy booster with a super nice taste.   Just tried the Oasis Clear Vape pen......I mean...... the whole vape pen.   :). Wow.  Jack Herrer never tasted so nice and of course, due to my lack of self control, I am as blasted as I would have been if I had been straight dabbing.   Always a go to strain for me”
“very nice uplifting high without anxious or paranoid side effects”

“I'm not a sativa person. Most sativas don't give me a good, happy high like indicas do. However, Jack Herer is one of my FAVORITE strains, even as a sativa dominant hybrid. When we looked back not stoned, they actually weren't all bad ideas (most of our not stoned ideas...”
“favorite get up and go strain. gc is good but I think the crack edge is surpassed by jacks smooth smile. for me jack is the best a.m.strain. social anxiety is gone with jack.”

“I'm normally not a sativa person, but wow. My tolerance is pretty strong and this got me sky high like it was nothing.”

“This a five star med for sure. .the flavors and the smells are amazing. ..I can't think right meow ohhh well I'll rewrite this later”

Stuck in Amsterdam I tried: reading maps, got lost, couldn't stay with one thought, made multi tasking impossible. This was not a good weed to keep me focused. It didn't make me sleepy though, just a bit bored.”
“It's not the type of strain I'd usually smoke. To me it's past its prime and it's time to bag up the rest and bury it. RIP Jack Herer👎🏾”
“the bomb diggity bomb love it top indica in my book besides the Bubba kushes”

“Smoked this one in Amsterdam. Got me completely smashed after a couple of hits. Messed me up bad, i couldn't do anything that demanded multi-tasking: reading maps, remembering stuff, plannig. This weed turned me into a vegetable. Did not like, It will get you stoned though.”
“Smoked 4-5 joints in 4-5h so effects were varied.”

“Don't remember much from this strain. Smell was okay, certainly for a cheap strain.
Taste was good, but kinda faint. As if I were smoking just a cigarette.

Before sleeping, this turns into a good ride. Clear high, slight stoned effect.

Good if you're a Sativa lover. Peace & Love, T.”

“I may have gotten a bad batch of this strain, but I was not impressed.  When rolling it didn't want to stick well, it did look, smell, and taste good, but definitely did not have a great high.  My vision was a little off, but no head rush or body high.  Disappointed in the strain overall, I hope it can prove me wrong some day.  Definitely not worth the $20/g I paid for it, maybe $10/g at most.”

“I normally love this strain however Downtown Dispensary in Tucson is not very considerate of its customers. I wrote two different reviews and neither of them are posted. I know good fro and it tasted worse than brick weed :(”
“Nothing special.”
